102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Tokyo_1: From an island he suspended above Tokyo, the enigmatic Master Weaver plans to use the energy from a temporal rift created by the Timestream Entanglement to strengthen the Web of Life and Destiny.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Hydra_2: HYDRA lurks quietly beneath the ice, brewing a Doomsday Plan that would overturn the entire world.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Hydra_3: To create the ultimate super-soldiers and dominate every timeline, they tirelessly mine this ore from the deepest sections of their hallowed Charteris base.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Klyntar_2: Their destination: the mysterious symbiotic prison turned living planet, Klyntar.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Wakanda_2: Princess Shuri and her Wakandan science team relentlessly research the effects of Chronovium on Vibranium, while also collaborating with heroes from other timelines on their Timestream Reintegration Device.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Klyntar_1: Commissioned by Shuri, the Guardians of the Galaxy set out from Wakanda to investigate the dark force corrupting Bast and the other Orisha.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Klyntar_5: Now trapped on Klyntar, the Guardians of the Galaxy must confront the Lethal Protector and use the essence to burrow into the world before the King in Black awakens…
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Wakanda_3: Meanwhile, King T'Challa seeks to liberate the spirit of Bast, ensnared within this new Chrono-Vibranium, to restore the Hall of Djalia and combat the ominous threat of encroaching darkness.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Hydra_5: Behind a dark and ancient portal, an evil that threatens the entire multiverse awakens...
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Asgard_2: Carrying on their master's legacy, Toothgrinder and Toothgnasher trudge towards the tapping device at the roots of Yggdrasill. If the last rumble of thunder contained within the enchanted hammer Stormbreaker can be summoned, the fate of Ten Realms can yet be reshaped...
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Hydra_1: The Timestream Entanglement has disrupted the timelines at Earth's two poles, resulting in the appearance of the mysterious Chronovium ore at Hell's Heaven in the South Pole.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Wakanda_1: When the Timestream Entanglement enwrapped the Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda, mysterious anomalies arose within the home planet of Vibranium. Simultaneously, the spirit realm, Djalia, began to merge with Birnin T'Challa in the physical world.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Klyntar_4: Yet beneath the surface stirs the essence of their dark god imprisoned within the world's core, powerful enough to destroy the entire planet and free Knull.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Klyntar_3: The Agents of the Cosmos channeled the immeasurable cosmic power of the orbiting dead Celestial to calm the densely-populated planet of symbiotes, its very codex remaining active to this day.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Tokyo_2: His disciple, Spider-Zero, has concerns about her master's actions and is leading an effort to stitch the rift closed for good.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Asgard_3: Obviously, this act of defiance has caught the attention of the new King of Yggsgard, Loki. And the God of Mischief is more than glad to use every dirty trick he knows to quell the uprising.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Hydra_4: But HYDRA will not stop at simple timestream conquest—they are now exploring a higher power...
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Asgard_1: The Ten Realms have seen their share of war... and it looks like rebellion is brewing once again in Yggsgard.
102_Subtitle_ST.Loading_Tokyo_3: The Master Weaver doesn't handle disobedience well, so he banished Spider-Zero from Spider-Islands. Still, Zero's ready to do whatever it takes to save the day and earn back her rightful spot on the Web.

107_Login_ST.TXT_AgePrompt:
1、本游戏是一款基于漫威英雄研发的竞技类游戏，适用于年满16周岁及以上的用户，建议未成年人在家长监护下使用游戏产品。
2、本游戏以漫威英雄为背景，所有故事均为虚构。游戏玩法基于肢体操作，设有竞技对抗比赛，鼓励玩家提升和挑战自我。游戏中有基于文字和语音的陌生人社交系统。
3、游戏中有用户实名认证系统，未实名账号不能登录游戏。认证为未成年人的用户将接受以下管理：
游戏中部分玩法和道具需要付费。未满8周岁的用户不能付费；8周岁以上未满16周岁的未成年人用户，单次充值金额不得超过50元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过200元人民币；16周岁以上的未成年人用户，单次充值金额不得超过100元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过400元人民币。
未成年玩家可在周五、周六、周日和法定节假日每日晚20时至21时登录游戏，其他时间无法登录游戏。
4、本游戏将漫威超级英雄突破自我、拯救世界的故事与玩法相结合，有助于玩家在体验超级英雄的魅力时，培养积极向上、勇于争先的品质。同时，游戏玩法是团队合作模式，需要玩家相互配合进行比赛，有助于培养玩家的团队协作能力。
5、本游戏为虚拟场景和情节，现实生活中请勿沉浸游戏、模仿相关行为。

107_Login_ST.TXT_MaintenanceContent:
亲爱的玩家：
感谢你对《漫威争锋》的支持和关注，很荣幸邀请到各位参与本次封闭测试。
测试时间：2024年3月15日~3月19日

活动一：伽娜塔的赠礼
1、每日活跃实时抽奖：在每天19~21点保持在线，每20分钟从在线玩家中抽取10名获奖者，奖励将通过邮件通知
2、测试结束后，对BUG有效反馈数量前10名玩家发放奖励
注：游戏主页界面设有活动入口，可查看具体活动内容
活动二：开发者挑战赛
每日19~21点，玩家可以通过房间模式与开发者队伍战斗
注：游戏主页界面设有开发者挑战赛活动入口
活动三：黎明巅峰赛
参赛队伍需在本次测试第二天的23:59前，通过游戏内主页的报名问卷进行报名
巅峰赛前三将会获得实物奖励

温馨提示：游戏中部分内容非最终完成度（包括但不限于模型、场景、动画、界面），不代表最终品质。更多的游戏内容和优化仍在努力进行，不足之处，还请各位玩家理解包涵。也欢迎参与内测的玩家们提出宝贵意见，和我们一起打造更完美的游戏体验。

107_Login_ST.TXT_WarnContent: A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns, visual effects, or sensory stimuli. This can occur even in those without a prior history of epilepsy or seizures. If you or any family members have a history of epilepsy or have experienced similar symptoms, it is important to consult a doctor before playing. If you experience any symptoms such as dizziness, visual anomalies, nausea, muscle twitches, convulsions, or altered consciousness (including fainting), stop playing immediately and seek medical assistance. Only resume playing based on your doctor's guidance.

2. They can't send you invites or requests.

111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_EscortTutorialDescriptionDetail: Master the rules and clinch victory in Convoy.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_ControlTutorialDescriptionDetail: Master the rules and clinch victory in Domination.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_HeroTutorialDescrible: Master the classes and abilities of Super Heroes.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_BeginerTutorialDescrible2: Master basic movement and shooting skills.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_BeginerTutorialDescrible:
Get the hang of basic moving and shooting.
Dive into the classes and abilities of Super Heroes.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_QuickModeDescription:
Players: 12
Heroes: No duplicate heroes
Maps: {MapNames}
Victory: Complete specified mission objectives.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_CompetitionDescription:
Players: 12
Heroes: No duplicate heroes
Maps: Yggsgard: Yggdrasill Path, Yggsgard: Royal Palace, Tokyo 2099: Shin-Shibuya, Tokyo 2099: Spider-Islands
Victory: Score more points than the enemy team.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_MachinePracticeDescrible:
Players: 6
Heroes: No duplicate heroes
Map: Random
Victory: Defeat the bots to accomplish the mission objectives.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_WinterCelebrationDescrible:
Players: 8
Hero: Jeff the Land Shark
Map: {MapNames}
Respawn: Away from enemies
Victory: Decorate more of the map within the time limit.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_FreeTeamDeathMatchDescription:
Mode: Arcade
Players: 12
Heroes: No duplicate heroes
Map: {MapNames}
Respawn: Away from enemies
Victory: Defeat enemies and collect Chronovium. The first to reach the target score wins.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_TrainFieldDescrible:
Practice to fight as a Super Hero. 
Explore the unique gameplay of Team-Up Abilities.
111_ModeSelection_ST.Text_ModeCustomGameDescrible:
Pick your own allies and opponents.
Add bots with your choice of difficulty and heroes.
Choose your preferred map and mode.
Or join as a spectator and watch the rivalry unfold.

·   6-player faction led by a Captain/Coach 
·   Initiate matching during the Open & Closed Qualifiers.
·   Seize points through battles with other factions.
·   Check the details on the Event Page.

112_Rank_ST.ShieldProtectionNotChargingForAFK: <Default>Chrono Shield didn't charge due to AFK during gameplay.</>
112_Rank_ST.ShieldProtectionNotChargingForReconnectT: <Default>Chrono Shield didn't charge due to a disconnection timeout during gameplay.</>

112_Rank_ST.TXT_Season_0_HonorMedal_1_Description: Prestigious accolade bestowed upon the top 500 players of Season 0. Display it on your name card as a mark of distinction.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_Season_0_HonorMedal_2_Description: Prestigious accolade bestowed upon Grandmaster rank players of Season 0. Display it on your name card as a mark of distinction.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_DoNotMeetTheRequirements: You do not meet the Competitive Play requirements.
112_Rank_ST.RankSurpassPlayerPercent: You're ranked higher than <Num>{Percent}%</> of players server-wide.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_Rank_Detailed_Rule: Hit 100 points, and you'll level up your rank; run out of points, and you'll get some Chrono Shields to keep you afloat. But once those are gone, you will drop to a lower rank!
112_Rank_ST.RankRule2_Desc: Amidst the entangled timestreams, the cosmos grants you Chrono Shields against a rank descent. Only when these are depleted will you truly fall to the lower rank.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_SettlementEscapeTips: AFK detected. No points will be awarded for this game.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_WillBeDistributedAtTheEndOfTheSeason: Rewards will be dished out at the end of the season.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_MaxNum: Chronovium maxed out, no further point to gain.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_SpaceTimeChannelDescription: Win competitive matches to climb the rank and reap bountiful season rewards!
112_Rank_ST.TXT_SettlementAfkTooLongTips: Reconnection failed. No points will be awarded for this game.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_SpaceTimeChannelIsConnected: A new timeline portal has opened.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_UnableToOpenTheSpaceTimeChannel: Unable to open a new timeline portal for you.
112_Rank_ST.RankRule1_Desc: Rack up points with every win and hitting 100 points will level up your rank. Reach Eternity and you'll need to keep active or face the penalty of losing points.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_CBTRewardContent: Hit "<Important>Gold</>" rank to unlock an exclusive permanent spray <Important>Tooth and Hammer</>!
112_Rank_ST.TXT_HaveNoChronoProtection: For Eternity and higher ranks, Chrono Shields can't be used against star loss.
112_Rank_ST.RankRule_InactiveWarningTip: No divisions for ETERNITY and ONE ABOVE ALL. Instead, you need to gain points to rank up. If you don't compete for a while, you'll enter dormancy, and your points will start to drop.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_CBTRewardNoOpenContent: Upon the big reveal, hit "<Important>Gold</>" rank to unlock an exclusive permanent reward!
112_Rank_ST.RankRule3_Desc: The game can have multiple rounds, and the team that wins the most rounds wins the game. Cosmic Selection: When all players in the match are Diamond III or above, each team gets to ban one hero before the match starts.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_CBTRewardCanGetContent: Way to go! Grab your exclusive permanent spray <Important>Tooth and Hammer</>!
112_Rank_ST.TXT_FullCrysScore: You've hit the weekly point limit.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_DescriptionOfSeasonSettlement: Upon season conclusion, you will receive rewards based on your highest rank achieved.
112_Rank_ST.RankRule4_Desc: Upon season conclusion, rewards are given based on the highest rank achieved. Players in the top 500 at the time of seasonal settlement will receive the "One Above All" Timestream Honor reward.
112_Rank_ST.TXT_OpeningMode: Get food for me by earning XP points in Quick Match Arcade Mode! Unlock ranked matches after reaching a certain amount.
112_Rank_ST.RankRule_RankLevelMatchRule: Players in adjacent ranks can form teams and match together. Bronze and Silver are considered one rank.

113_Ranking_ST.TXT_RankRankingDescription:
1. Global Leaderboard: Top 500 players across all servers.
2. Climb the ranks and leaderboard by winning Competitive matches.
3. You must hit at least "Platinum" rank to be listed.
4. Players with the same rank are sorted by score, and if scores are tied, by who reached it first.
5. The leaderboard updates periodically.
6. Daily settlements at {refresh_time} promote the top 500 players with "Eternity" rank to "One Above All".
7. Players who rank in the top 500 at seasonal settlement will receive the "Timestream Honor" reward.
113_Ranking_ST.TXT_HeroRankingDescription:
1. Hero Leaderboard: The top 200 players from all servers, ranked by their hero ratings.
2. Hero ratings are determined by performance, total wins, and win rate in Competitive mode.
3. Heroes must meet a minimum playtime requirement to qualify for ranking.
4. Players with matching hero ratings are ranked in order of reaching the rating first.
5. The leaderboard refreshes automatically daily at {refresh_time}.
113_Ranking_ST.TXT_HeroRankingOverallListDescription:
1. Hero Leaderboard: The top 200 players from all servers, ranked by their hero ratings.
2. Hero ratings are determined by performance, total wins, and win rate in Competitive mode.
3. Heroes must meet a minimum playtime requirement to qualify for ranking.
4. Players with matching hero ratings are ranked in order of reaching the rating first.
5. The leaderboard refreshes automatically daily at {refresh_time}.
113_Ranking_ST.TXT_ComingSoon: Almost on the Leaderboard, <Ranking>{Rank}</> spots to go.
113_Ranking_ST.TXT_PleaseAddAFriend: You haven't added any friends yet.

114_Squad_ST.TXT_ConsoleOnlyRuleContent: With the cross-platform update, players now have the option to enable the console-only function. This choice is influenced by the team composition and may not be adjustable, so please review the option for further details. Enabling it allows you to stick with players from your own platform, though be aware it might lengthen your wait for a match.

114_Squad_ST.TXT_XBoxCrossRuleTipsContent: Stuck waiting too long to match? Head over to Xbox System > My Account > Privacy & Online Safety to enable cross-platform play. Re-login to see the magic happen and slash those wait times!
114_Squad_ST.TXT_ConsoleOnlyMatchingWaitTooLong: Stuck waiting too long to match? Why not flip the cross-platform switch and give it another go? It's a quick fix to cut down that wait time!

114_Squad_ST.TXT_XBoxCrossRuleContent:
Turn on cross-platform play to battle alongside players from different platforms.
Turn it off to stick with players from your own platform, though be aware it might lengthen your wait for a match.
To change this setting, head over to Xbox System > My Account > Privacy & Online Safety. Changes take effect upon re-login.
114_Squad_ST.TXT_CrossRuleContent:
Turn on cross-platform play to battle alongside players from different platforms; however, you won't face PC players in the Competitive mode.
Turn it off to stick with players from your own platform, though be aware it might lengthen your wait for a match.
This option also affects your team invites and requests – if it's not aligned, players can't join forces.
114_Squad_ST.TXT_AvoidSameTeam_AlreadyInList: This player is already on your "Avoid as Teammate" list.
114_Squad_ST.TXT_ServerNode_Remind: Opt for a low-latency server for better gameplay. High latency might cause lag or disconnections.

115_Task_ST.MarvelTaskCategoryTable_2_Description:
1. Challenge Missions unlock periodically and must be completed before the countdown expires.
2. Challenge Missions can be refreshed, with up to 3 refresh attempts accumulating over time.
3. Challenge Missions can be pinned. Once a pinned mission is completed, it will automatically unpin.
4. Progress for certain missions can be tracked within a match.
115_Task_ST.MarvelTaskCategoryTable_1_Description:
1. Daily Missions unlock periodically and must be completed before the countdown expires.
2. Daily Missions can be refreshed, with up to 3 refresh attempts accumulating over time.
3. Daily Missions can be pinned. Once a pinned mission is completed, it will automatically unpin.
4. Progress for certain missions can be tracked within a match.

117_UserSettings_ST.GraphicSettingEntryTable_PS5P_GraphicSet:
Pro Mode: Prioritizes graphical quality, aiming for a stable frame rate of 60 frames per second and enhanced graphics. This mode supports Lumen global illumination and reflections for more realistic lighting.

HFR Mode: Prioritizes smoothness, running at a frame rate of up to 120 frames per second. This mode provides smooth gameplay and lower input latency for faster, more precise gameplay. (Note that you'll need a 120Hz or greater display to experience the full effect.)

120Hz output must be enabled in your console's system settings to activate HFR Mode.
117_UserSettings_ST.Key1UnBindWithKey2AndBindWithKey3: {Key1}<Tips_Default> has been unbound from "{Key2}" and is now bound to "{Key3}"</>.

117_UserSettings_ST.UnBind_Gamepad_Scoreboard: {key=Gamepad_Special_Left} is dedicated to the scoreboard and can't be remapped.
117_UserSettings_ST.Mixing_Presets_Whole_Desc:
Default: A balanced mixing style.

Focus: A focused mixing style.
Enhances your own sound feedback while highlighting the most immediate threats. Please note, this preset may reduce your audible range, environmental ambiance, spatial audio feedback, and distant soundscapes, which could affect your overall immersion.

Immersion: An immersive mixing style.
Allows you to hear more enemies, destruction, and explosions for a richer combat experience. Please note, in this preset, the increased density of sounds might make it harder to perceive some important cues, and during team fights, your character's auditory feedback might be reduced.
117_UserSettings_ST.Display_AntiAliasing_ModeDesc: Different anti-aliasing and super resolution modes have different effects on graphics and performance.

117_UserSettings_ST.GraphicSettingEntryTable_PS_GraphicSetti:
Standard Mode: Prioritizes graphical quality, aiming for a stable frame rate of 60 frames per second and enhanced graphics. This mode supports Lumen global illumination and reflections for more realistic lighting.

HFR Mode: Prioritizes smoothness, running at a frame rate of up to 120 frames per second. This mode provides smooth gameplay and lower input latency for faster, more precise gameplay. (Note that you'll need a 120Hz or greater display to experience the full effect.)

120Hz output must be enabled in your console's system settings to activate HFR Mode.
117_UserSettings_ST.GraphicSettingEntryTable_Xbox_GraphicSet:
Standard Mode: Prioritizes graphical quality, aiming for a stable frame rate of 60 frames per second and enhanced graphics. This mode supports Lumen global illumination and reflections for more realistic lighting.

HFR Mode: Prioritizes smoothness, running at a frame rate of up to 120 frames per second. This mode provides smooth gameplay and lower input latency for faster, more precise gameplay. (Note that you'll need a 120Hz or greater display to experience the full effect.)

120Hz output must be enabled in your console's system settings to activate HFR Mode.

118_Career_ST.Title_RuleContent:
1. Nameplates can only display unique titles.
2. You can select different heroes to customize your title (with such customization displaying a custom logo for your avatar). You can switch to a certain title by switching to the corresponding hero in the team-up screen.
3. Titles can be removed. You can adjust your title by selecting all heroes, without impacting your hero-customized title.
118_Career_ST.Tips_HighLightDetails:

2. Version updates may cause highlights to expire, so please save them in time.

119_Novice_ST.BattleTutorial_105101801: The more Dark Magic, the higher the damage of {Ability1}.

120_Signal_ST.Corona_Tips: Hold {Key1} to bring up the Ping Wheel in-game.

Cause damage and experience the destruction gameplay.

Combat Training Area:

121_Train_ST.TXT_Introduce01: Welcome, next I will introduce the Practice Range.

Training target movement methods in the scene.

Vertical: Move up and down vertically.
Random: Move randomly about the area.

Set random training target generation range.
Short-range: 10 - 30m
Mid-range: 20 - 40m
Long-range: 40 - 60m

Training targets can be generated at different distances.
Fixed: Targets are generated at the selected distance.
Random: Targets will be randomly generated within the selected range.

Adjust the health of training targets

122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110016_Lines: (Hulk voice): No puny Banner, am Hulk now.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110070_Lines: If at first you don't succeed…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110173_Lines: Next stop, the Weaver. Hit it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110222_Lines: Defend the area at all costs.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110086_Lines: Hulk isn't the only one with a temper. Banner can smash things too. Like instruments that don't work.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111014_Lines: Hydra needs to be crushed in any timeline.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111004_Lines: Can't let the Monster out at the wrong time.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111102_Lines: Never say Hulk is stupid just because Banner is smart.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110126_Lines: I destroyed the ankh instead of studying it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111122_Lines: Ugly place. Symbiotes must love it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110179_Lines: That tree's not looking too good. We should hurry.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111296_Lines: Big talk for such a little man.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110020_Lines: Why are Hydra bases always so grandiose?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110162_Lines: Nerds hold grudges. Now you know.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110239_Lines: I remember the scientists who made you, Adam. They were not good people.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111107_Lines: People think you're too skinny to be strong. But you're strong.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111056_Lines: They won't just let us have it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111072_Lines: He’s a god. He'll be back soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110118_Lines: It's a portal! Here they come!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111143_Lines: Portal. Gonna smash whoever comes through.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110087_Lines: I can store gamma energy…but anger I have to let go.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110192_Lines: The belt takes a minute to charge, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111127_Lines: Because you don't mess everything up with too many words.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110167_Lines: You only make that mistake once.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110175_Lines: Our future hangs in the balance. Keep Spider-Zero safe.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110180_Lines: Move it! Yggdrasill can't survive tapping much longer.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111012_Lines: A lot has changed since the Defenders days, doc.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110009_Lines: Castle, can you please…ummm, punish less? You, you stress me out.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111007_Lines: Saving the world one more time, right, Tony?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110002_Lines: Being the Hulk isn't so bad.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110238_Lines: Only Namor would endanger his own subjects so.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110092_Lines: I don't think I'm a mutant.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111078_Lines: Stark always has to show off. It's like his brand.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110021_Lines: This must be like a reunion for you, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111268_Lines: Sure sounds like Hulk. But trust me. You ain't seen nothing yet.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110242_Lines: I think my green guy tries to do that too.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111105_Lines: Uhh, what is shark thing with feet?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111114_Lines: Heh. Hulk wishes the tiny human inside of hulk had this much attitude.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111010_Lines: Okay. Hulk'll let you know when Hulk want to smash something.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111116_Lines: Humans and their puny feelings. Heh.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111186_Lines: Ha ha ha, Hulk smashed all enemies!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111104_Lines: Mhm, here's three: You're not funny.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110189_Lines: Huh. So in this future, Tony finally had to cooperate with someone.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110240_Lines: Hmm. I suppose that's something I've been fighting to do every day of my life. But it's not easy.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110233_Lines: Hmm. Some sort of aggressive cephalopods…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110013_Lines: Don't take this the wrong way, Marc. But if you need help… you know, emotionally, try Dr. Leonard Samson. He's a good friend.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110136_Lines: I culled the turret before it culled me.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110093_Lines: No thanks. I think this is just me, spending years trying to make the most efficient use of gamma radiation.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110241_Lines: Everyone feared it, right? I've heard that story.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110089_Lines: It's not easy being Banner when everyone wants you-know-who.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110174_Lines: Let's get this Spider to the Shrine.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110119_Lines: Strange opened a portal! Get ready…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110194_Lines: Okay. Time to be a hero.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110091_Lines: Guess I'm not going to have a choice.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111002_Lines: Listen, Hulk admit he still working on his anger management.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110251_Lines: If my theory is correct, this should stop Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111128_Lines: If Banner saw this place he would be too busy playing with gadgets to fight.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111293_Lines: Puny human thinks he's strong. How cute.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111295_Lines: Good thing you're not on the other side, runt.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111303_Lines: What is Gold Man staring at?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110017_Lines: Just kidding! Gee, you need to chill, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111048_Lines: Done. Knew we could do it!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110260_Lines: If we hope to stop Knull, we have to move!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111291_Lines: Why? Does little Claw Man want to be broken?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111092_Lines: The monster is about to come out of its cage!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110272_Lines: I'm afraid I have to say the same to you.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110120_Lines: The Punisher created a turret for himself.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110081_Lines: I'm not feeling well, help me!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110085_Lines: I'm not Hulk. He is part of me, but he's not all of me.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110107_Lines: I'm heroic in my own way.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110185_Lines: We need to be moving faster than this.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110088_Lines: We will build the TRD, and we will set this universe right.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110252_Lines: We can weaponize Knull's essence against him.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110038_Lines: I think we can all be proud.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111054_Lines: Have to fight for what we want!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110220_Lines: Here's the area we have to capture.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110182_Lines: We should have been much farther along by now.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111084_Lines: We needed Tony. This is bad.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110172_Lines: We have to stop Loki's tapping operation! Go!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110004_Lines: I'm trying to make the gamma in me useful!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110071_Lines: Did I come through the Green Door again?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110001_Lines: Hulk and I, we're a team.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110006_Lines: I'm warming up to the field missions, they're breaks from the labs.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110005_Lines: I want to understand the Timestream Entanglement.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110024_Lines: I am Bruce Banner and I am calm.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110097_Lines: I know. We're here to defend Intergalactic Empire Of Wakanda. But the TRD project needs your brain too.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110161_Lines: And I never even Hulked up!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110187_Lines: I hate people who pervert science for cruel ends.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111009_Lines: My fists, your hammer. Let's go.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110117_Lines: That sure looks like a Doctor Strange portal.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111003_Lines: Took me years to control this form.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110143_Lines: I got the sniper. That's right, me.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110135_Lines: I managed to get the Punisher out of his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110152_Lines: I go up, they go down!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110099_Lines: And I do have some gamma grenades.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110164_Lines: I shouldn't love revenge, but I do.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110015_Lines: We've got a time stream to put back together, Tony.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111197_Lines: Take axe to tree, make Loki mad. Heh heh.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111204_Lines: Bring stone kitty cat to Panther.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110183_Lines: At this rate we'll never get there.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111156_Lines: Build another beacon! Hulk smash that too!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110047_Lines: We're out of time, gotta attack now!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111058_Lines: Time running out. Get em now.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111266_Lines: More scared of what I could do if you make me unleash it…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110124_Lines: Someone left a nest of robot spiders here.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111015_Lines: A lot of this needs smashing, Cap. Wouldn't you agree?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110045_Lines: Hit em while we have the chance!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110007_Lines: Doom is brilliant. So am I. We can out-think him.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110212_Lines: This is a good defensible spot.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110271_Lines: We all have our demons. I just happen to let mine out every now and then.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111066_Lines: Everyone wants to take on Hulk. Idiots.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110090_Lines: We really should be in the lab.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111292_Lines: Don't need to. Hulk can rip it apart, piece by piece.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110022_Lines: No trace of gamma radiation here. Good, guess they gave up on messing with it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110201_Lines: Keep an eye on this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111113_Lines: Hulk doesn't like spiders. Especially big shiny ones.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111138_Lines: Don't like red dot on green skin.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111267_Lines: Hulk has no idea what pretty lady is talking about.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111016_Lines: Hulk don't smell gamma. Let's hope Hydra finally gave up on the experiments.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111126_Lines: Hulk likes fighting with big tree.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111207_Lines: Hmm… Feel like Hulk should knock that over.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111262_Lines: Give Hulk one good reason not to toss you back into the ocean.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111161_Lines: Peeled Punisher out of his can.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111100_Lines: Hulk is a bigger hero than Banner!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111294_Lines: So is Hulk's rage. Wanna see which is stronger?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111304_Lines: Hulk uses his anger for good. Most of the time.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111115_Lines: Hulk already has enough voices in Hulks head. Don't need another.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110077_Lines: I am ready to let Hulk out!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111121_Lines: Love smashing Hydra. Let's do it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111260_Lines: Call bigger monsters next time, Fish Man.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110178_Lines: En route with a special delivery for T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110096_Lines: We need your help on the TRD, T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110106_Lines: Now do you believe I can fight?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110104_Lines: This is crunch time. Hang in there.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111101_Lines: Smartest thing Banner ever did was make Gamma Belt stretchy.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111001_Lines: Banner is tactical support, Hulk is all heavy duty.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110140_Lines: The last spider has left this nest.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110204_Lines: Seems like this area could all come crashing down…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111125_Lines: Wonder if you're a Spider-Person in another timeline.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110103_Lines: We're so close. Can't give in now.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110259_Lines: We need to get this underground. Now!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111259_Lines: Should've never come out of the ocean...
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110236_Lines: The octopi have been removed from play.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111257_Lines: Squids?! Bah! Hulk will rip off every tentacle!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110064_Lines: Wait…isn't he a god? How is that possible?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110098_Lines: Thor, what am I even doing here? How can I help?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110235_Lines: Namor has summoned his undersea allies.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110181_Lines: The Weaver can't wait forever. We have to go faster.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111265_Lines: This isn't time to settle old grudges, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110065_Lines: Spider-Man? But he was just a kid…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111200_Lines: Spider-lady has something for Weaver. We help.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111151_Lines: Spiders chase Hulk? Hulk crush nest!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111013_Lines: Yes, Cricket Lady go ahead. Please.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111256_Lines: Stupid Fish Man called in his stupid friends.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111060_Lines: There's going to be a fight.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110032_Lines: Thanks. Wish I could heal you back.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111050_Lines: Here's where we show our stuff.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111187_Lines: Hmm, Hulk might as well fight solo!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111005_Lines: Not used to being a hero.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111083_Lines: Couldn't weasel his way out of that.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111073_Lines: Eh, The worlds are all out of whack.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110186_Lines: We should have been there already!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110188_Lines: Humanity's best minds are working on this project. We'll get it done.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110114_Lines: What do these ankhs do, anyway?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110100_Lines: I'll take all the healing I can get.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110234_Lines: These creatures must be under Namor's command.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110171_Lines: This weapon has to get to Yggdrasil.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110177_Lines: This sacred statue is for the emperor? Better step on it.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110165_Lines: Now that's what I call a misstep!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110072_Lines: I have to get this right this time.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110094_Lines: This…this is what humanity should be. I never want to go home.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110095_Lines: This place has some deep, dark secrets.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110116_Lines: Ankh here! I'd love to study one of these…
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110128_Lines: Anks are all wiped out here.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111282_Lines: Get underground, no more King in Black.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110044_Lines: We need to take our shot now!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110048_Lines: I'm guessing those are the bad guys.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111109_Lines: Absolutely. You going to do lightning tricks?
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110133_Lines: There will be no further amplifying of yarn!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110129_Lines: Interesting device, this beacon. Or was, anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111077_Lines: Cap almost as tough as Hulk, heh heh. Not.
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10110227_Lines: Get this thing off the road!
122_HeroVoice_1011_ST.1011001_HeroVoice_10111261_Lines: Fish man? Ugh. Hulk hates stupid Fish Man.

122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140280_Lines: I don't listen to music. I punish criminals.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140333_Lines: Don't stop now! Knull ain't coming back on my watch!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140006_Lines: When I find whoever did this to the world, that will be a bad day for them.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140004_Lines: I'll fight this war against crime until I fall.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140024_Lines: A Hydra base? Good thing I packed some extra magazines.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140208_Lines: Maybe the rest of your ought to shoot faster.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140213_Lines: You heard me coming, didn't you?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140298_Lines: Quite a kingdom you got here.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140081_Lines: You made a bad choice, kid.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140002_Lines: You hurt people, I hurt you.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140291_Lines: The Winter Soldier. It's an honor. You're one of the best in the business.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140010_Lines: Anything that increases my firepower, I like.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140241_Lines: Hold your horses. It takes a minute.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140018_Lines: Don't worry, I'm ready for the Hulk.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140166_Lines: Robot spiders all over the place.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140062_Lines: There's still a fight ahead of us.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140007_Lines: I've seen a lot of stuff I never signed up for in Special Forces.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140229_Lines: Step lively, or Loki's going to have all the chronovium he wants.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140234_Lines: Step on it. The king needs his cat statue.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140092_Lines: Adding to your underworld army, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140148_Lines: New entry in the War Journal.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140041_Lines: Agh, I don't need healing anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140210_Lines: Set em up, knock em down.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140090_Lines: You don't want to become like me.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140134_Lines: If you need giant robots, it's because you know your soldiers won't fight.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140281_Lines: You and me, Spector. We're two of a kind.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140284_Lines: Heh. Never figured I'd have something in common with a talking raccoon.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140159_Lines: Shoot these ankhs wherever you find them.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140039_Lines: Grrr… is that all you got?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140015_Lines: Hey I'm watching you. Make one move I don't like and I'm dropping you on the spot.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140292_Lines: Hey. I don't tell you not to idolize the red, white, and blue, boy scout. Let me do me.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140282_Lines: That's not it. We're alike because we both know there are some problems that can only be solved by force.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140228_Lines: Better kick it up a gear if we're gonna save the tree.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140243_Lines: Locked and loaded. Just need a target.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140147_Lines: Hold the perimeter! Time's on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140308_Lines: Like shooting squids in a barrel!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140286_Lines: Maybe for other people. Not for me.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140001_Lines: Right is right and wrong is wrong.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140014_Lines: You kids should stay out of this.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140293_Lines: Bucky. Always feels good going into a fight with you.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140225_Lines: Let's get Spider-Zero where she needs to go.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140095_Lines: Nice work, Captain. Or is it Colonel?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140058_Lines: Good, this is where I make my stand.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140231_Lines: We're close to the Weaver. Finish the mission.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140235_Lines: Faster. We need to get to T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140011_Lines: A bad guy's a bad guy. No real difference between any of ' em.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140019_Lines: Can't believe I'm fighting along side with THE LEGEND, sir. We'll finally end this dirty war!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140340_Lines: Wanna put that to the test, old man?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140135_Lines: Always liked Tokyo. But it wasn't always this spidery.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140005_Lines: I'm not a hero, I'm the Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140023_Lines: I don't help. I eliminate threats and scum who might be threats.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140271_Lines: We took this area. Now hold it.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140296_Lines: We here to take it back?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140269_Lines: We do not control this, and we need to.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140114_Lines: I'll meet my family, but not today!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140101_Lines: I'll take good care of your guns!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140288_Lines: I will. Then I'll be right back home cracking skulls in New York.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140129_Lines: I'm a blunt instrument. That's how I like it.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140209_Lines: I don't have time to wait for you.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140131_Lines: I like the future. It has kickass ordnance.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140124_Lines: Wounded and injured, but I still carry on!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140212_Lines: I was always coming back for you.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140130_Lines: You know a word I don't like? Nuance.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140003_Lines: Only cowards see shades of gray.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140022_Lines: War Journal entry: This world is officially sick, a talking raccoon's got better guns than me.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140299_Lines: War's a universal language, T'Challa. And I am fluent.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140064_Lines: Find cover and get ready to defend.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140221_Lines: Give Loki a problem? Let's do it;.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140273_Lines: Get this vehicle where it needs to go.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140332_Lines: We deliver this essence or we go down trying!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140272_Lines: Reminder: Now we have to defend it.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140324_Lines: Get the space goop to the basement. Got it.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140063_Lines: Enemy inbound! We don't budge an inch!
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140013_Lines: At least I know I can trust you.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140133_Lines: Someone should have stopped Doom a long time ago.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140012_Lines: Timestream Entanglement? What the hell does that mean?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140300_Lines: You feel at home here, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140021_Lines: Yeah? What you got in your trash can?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140287_Lines: Yeah, I'm not traveling as much. Unless I get a blasted into another timeline.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140341_Lines: Getting harder and harder to keep track these days…
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140236_Lines: There's somebody who needs a bullet.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140128_Lines: Weapons are tools. And I'm the master craftsman.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140088_Lines: Never thought I'd have to take Cap down.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140222_Lines: Never thought I'd care so much about spiders. Ride out.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140297_Lines: Sounds pretty. But I don't think your brother would agree.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140289_Lines: I don't play favorites. I don't listen to excuses.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140158_Lines: Step lightly. Might be more ankhs.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140223_Lines: Got a good field of fire. Next stop, the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140242_Lines: I feel a barrage coming on…
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140189_Lines: Sniper let me get too close.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140156_Lines: Sniper! Chase em, don't let em get set up.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140216_Lines: I didn't even have to push.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140083_Lines: Looks like bullets break your magic.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140309_Lines: Squids are toast. Now my sights are on their king.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140238_Lines: Like something I read in a comic when I was a kid.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140304_Lines: Namor's got some extra help. Lucky us.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140307_Lines: Thanks for the target practice, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140306_Lines: What the hell are those things, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140224_Lines: Riding shotgun for a spider. Life is strange.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140232_Lines: Keep rolling. We're getting close to Budokan.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140294_Lines: Think you're fast enough to stop a high velocity round aimed straight between your eyes, old timer?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140279_Lines: You look like you belong in high school. What are you?
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140136_Lines: This place could make me believe in magic.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140162_Lines: Got a portal here. I'm watching.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140167_Lines: Some kind of spider nest here.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140098_Lines: Don't see Wolverine go down every day.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140099_Lines: Cap, come on…you gotta get up.
122_HeroVoice_1014_ST.1014001_HeroVoice_10140325_Lines: It's almost lights out for the God of Darkness.

122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150267_Lines: Even a little storm would shake this area to pieces.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150101_Lines: Magneto's defeat should make me happy.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150001_Lines: Mutant or human, I fight for EVERYONE.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150016_Lines: I have to say, I'm inspired to fight WITH you, Prince of Lies.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150149_Lines: No matter the timeline, Hydra will always have a secret mountain base.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150008_Lines: Whatever happened to the world, I'm going to help fix it.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150072_Lines: We must be bold, and attack!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150133_Lines: Crossed timelines make for strange allies. Who do we trust?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150304_Lines: Back to the depths, vile creature!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150082_Lines: No pleasure in that, but it had to be done.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150070_Lines: How dare they invade our land!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150247_Lines: Our pace does not match the urgency of our mission.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150134_Lines: What is it like in Limbo now?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150178_Lines: A portal! Enemies will be coming!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150176_Lines: A portal! Doctor Strange has found us.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150136_Lines: Ah, but you can also do things I cannot.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150307_Lines: You are not the Psylocke I knew.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150137_Lines: Have you ever seen me heal anyone?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150311_Lines: Your war against the surface threatens man and Mutant alike.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150093_Lines: You're right, Logan. You're the best at what you do.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150308_Lines: Krakoa has brought you here. There must be a reason.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150024_Lines: The ascension to godhood can be achieved by worship and belief. But YOU...
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150222_Lines: Don't feel bad. Not everyone can be Storm.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150191_Lines: No Cosmic Yarn will be amplified here!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150338_Lines: Quickly! Our forecast grows darker by the second!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150337_Lines: Move faster! If Knull rises, we all fall!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150129_Lines: Mutants must protect mutants…but also all of humanity.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150091_Lines: Poor Wanda. Lost in the immensity of her power.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150236_Lines: We ride for the Web of Life and Destiny!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150146_Lines: No, thank you. The X-Men are enough family drama.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150145_Lines: Oh, would it? Let us see what our enemies think.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150130_Lines: Somewhere in the world is a little girl like I once was. I fight for her.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150175_Lines: Be wary until we destroy this ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150154_Lines: We have some business to take care of first.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150309_Lines: The winds may not be blowing in our favor, Erik.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150140_Lines: If I tried to contain it, I wouldn't last long. I channel it.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150193_Lines: The Amplifier suffered a power surge.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150252_Lines: The skies… They feel so calm… as if the winds themselves have been silenced…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150248_Lines: The Orisha mock our slow pace. Hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150110_Lines: You can't strike down a goddess.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150031_Lines: Feel the wrath of the Goddess!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150155_Lines: If one more person asks me what it would be like to be Empress Consort, they're going to get a lightning bolt where the sun don't shine.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150242_Lines: If we don't hurry, Loki will have enough sap to work his great magic.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150162_Lines: They cannot break us! Hold fast!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150228_Lines: A long fall for one who cannot fly.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150328_Lines: This statue is sacred to T'Challa. It must be delivered safely.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150291_Lines: Drive the enemy away from the vehicle!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150184_Lines: Spiders! They explode if they get close!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150303_Lines: Such strange creatures lurk below the waves…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150011_Lines: Cataclysm makes for strange allies, doesn't it?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150141_Lines: And then when you unleash the power…there's nothing like that in the world.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150234_Lines: Ride out! The World-Tree's life is in the balance.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150067_Lines: Quick, don't let them take it!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150180_Lines: The Punisher has entered turret mode.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150181_Lines: The Punisher has built a turret around himself!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150205_Lines: I will always lend a hand.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150157_Lines: I thought it was sound you symbiotes didn't like. Lightning too?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150112_Lines: I will not make the same mistakes again.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150142_Lines: I have no need for weapons. Nature's full fury is mine to command!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150315_Lines: If we X-Men know anything, it's change.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150286_Lines: We must keep control of this area!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150233_Lines: We must stop Loki from destroying Yggdrasill.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150062_Lines: I'll make good use of it.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150147_Lines: I wonder what the T'Challa I knew would have thought about this.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150196_Lines: I flushed the Punisher into the open again.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150312_Lines: It is my brothers and sisters on Krakoa that I am concerned for. What of them?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150156_Lines: I didn't have to imagine it. The people of Intergalactic Empire Of Wakanda did.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150002_Lines: I am a mutant, and proud to be one.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150127_Lines: I have been a street urchin, and Regent of the Solar System. But I am always Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150271_Lines: Mark this location! An enemy was here.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150087_Lines: An old enemy, vanquished at last.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150152_Lines: I'm sure you can smell it. I sense it too. An evil presence, watching us.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150009_Lines: I can feel the currents and electricity in my veins.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150182_Lines: I better give this nest a shock!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150117_Lines: My lightning power is still converging.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150025_Lines: So you didn't earn it, Mister One Percent.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150026_Lines: Manifest your Soulsword and let's get going.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150022_Lines: Please, Steve. You know too well that we are more than what we stand for.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150250_Lines: Chronovium has transformed these herbs. I remember them differently.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150272_Lines: Enemies were here. They may still be.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150243_Lines: Our enemies are slowing our progress too much.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150007_Lines: Billions of people are counting on us to put the timelines back where they belong.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150244_Lines: Worlds depend on us getting Spider-Zero to the Weaver. Go!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150131_Lines: Krakoa brought mutants together. So here we must make our stand.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150073_Lines: There is little time! Hit them with all we have!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150018_Lines: Chronovium has driven Krakoa insane. We have to figure it out on our own.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150094_Lines: You are a mighty ally, Wanda Maximoff!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150023_Lines: There were indeed witches and mages amount my ancestors, Stephen.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150139_Lines: I did. And as soon as we fix what Doom did, I'm going back.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150128_Lines: When you have been powerless, having power  means something.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150173_Lines: Moon Knight placed an ankh here.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150132_Lines: Doom — both Dooms — will answer for their crimes.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150316_Lines: In some ways, I think that may be a good thing…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150285_Lines: Mark this area, and take it!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150015_Lines: I think there are other priorities first.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150014_Lines: So, your Wakanda has gone galactic.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150195_Lines: The Punisher is on the move again!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150148_Lines: Asgard under Loki's rule…the timelines are truly crazed.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150305_Lines: The oceans shall claim you once more.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150153_Lines: Peni Parker. I am glad to have a local to show me around this Tokyo.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150188_Lines: Rocket's Beacon called down some lightning.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150086_Lines: How could it come to fighting T'Challa?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150171_Lines: We are in the sniper's sights!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150074_Lines: We must bring our full might to bear — now!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150210_Lines: I see I have made an impact.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150187_Lines: Ankhs do not handle lightning very well.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150245_Lines: We are nearing Budokan… but not fast enough.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150163_Lines: Stand firm, stand firm! We are winning!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150144_Lines: Ah, Thor, are you here to compare lightning?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150329_Lines: We shall use Knull's essence as a weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150302_Lines: Namor has called forth allies from the depths.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150306_Lines: Namor's subjects no longer pose a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150330_Lines: We cannot allow Knull's darkness to spread further.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150076_Lines: Be vigilant. The enemy is near.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150019_Lines: In times such as these, Logan, we have to be able to walk and chew gum.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150221_Lines: Am I making you all jealous?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150010_Lines: You don't have to be humble to be a hero. I'm not.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150150_Lines: Spider-Man. Have you encountered other Spider-People here?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150238_Lines: Spider-Zero! You drive and we will protect you.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150235_Lines: Courage, Spider-Zero. We will get you to the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150013_Lines: Try and keep yourself under control, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150004_Lines: Power is a great gift. It must be used wisely.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150006_Lines: In times like these, people with power must be at their best.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150310_Lines: Be careful. There are some forces that even I cannot alter.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150151_Lines: I don't think it's a secret.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150189_Lines: The Beacon is no longer broadcasting.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150186_Lines: This ankh is gone. Are there others?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150005_Lines: If these worlds come apart, countless people will die. I must stop it.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150268_Lines: Much of this can be brought crashing down.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150301_Lines: These beasts have come to defend their king.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150065_Lines: It belongs to the goddess now.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150251_Lines: So this is what wove the fabric of the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150273_Lines: A fine spot for a crushing attack.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150276_Lines: This would be a difficult place to attack.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150158_Lines: Then if we see any hostile symbiotes, they're in for a surprise.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150143_Lines: Our troubled past is not my primary concern right now, Wanda. It is the future that has me worried.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150197_Lines: Lightning is not good for electronic spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150100_Lines: I can't believe we lost Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150027_Lines: Quite true, Illyana. Who taught you that?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150029_Lines: Wind and thunder are by your side.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150118_Lines: The thunderstorm is about to hit.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150111_Lines: The wind will only blow stronger.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150257_Lines: The power of the storm gathers…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150003_Lines: Wind, cloud, and storm, hear my command!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150066_Lines: Wind and thunder watches over this land!

122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160349_Lines: ...Your king will be more than glad to regale you with epic tales of his glory!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160298_Lines: Not even a tiny bit? Come now.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160015_Lines: A new world is aborning—a shuffling of the galactic guard, if you will. You could be part of it.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160122_Lines: That was nothing for a god.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160308_Lines: All things have an end, brother, save Loki's ambition…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160350_Lines: Gather close and Loki shall tell you how he vanquished the Midgard Serpent and struck down Surtur himself!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160021_Lines: and no no no, I'm an Asgardian, dear. I was BORN a god~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160401_Lines: No King shall ascend to the throne this day!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160078_Lines: Oh I'm fine, don't mind me~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160003_Lines: Don't lie to me, I INVENTED every trick.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160417_Lines: I play the role I must to prevail. And it seems the next act is about to begin...
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160139_Lines: Why would anyone want order when they could enjoy chaos?...
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160086_Lines: Perhaps we should just ask them to leave?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160217_Lines: Five. I'm on a bit of a streak.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160140_Lines: Everyone loves a trickster — until the trick is played on them.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160014_Lines: Really? Well, a small price to pay to keep the Elder off my plans.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160085_Lines: Do they really believe they can keep this from a KING? How adorable~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160026_Lines: And then we grew up. Well, one of us did. You remain a stupid child.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160008_Lines: What is a hero? An overgrown child with a weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160222_Lines: You should not have made me angry.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160223_Lines: Did you think I would forget you?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160131_Lines: Your god is wounded! Are you mortals blind?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160242_Lines: Are you stuck in these cursed debris? No? Then move!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160080_Lines: You should all be very proud.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160105_Lines: Oh you should let the REAL monster out, Banner.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160192_Lines: You're just a man again, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160420_Lines: I am not human at all. I am a god! And you would be wise to treat me as such.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160296_Lines: After YOU picked him clean, I knew I would get blamed... so I made him forget.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160292_Lines: You're a man of few words, aren't you?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160328_Lines: Those magnetic powers of yours… How well do they work on Uru?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160299_Lines: Believe it or not, Doreen Green of Midgard, I'm helping.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160347_Lines: You dare sully the throne of Loki, King of Asgard?!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160321_Lines: There's your mistake, mortal. You assume I had one in the first place.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160302_Lines: I hope you detected my irony.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160186_Lines: The beacon needs a rebirth of its own.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160184_Lines: You need fear the ankh no longer!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160263_Lines: Much useful rubble could be created here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160277_Lines: Do not leave me to fight on my own!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160239_Lines: The tree will be fully tapped soon, unless we speed our progress.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160315_Lines: Who are you to judge my worth? That duty belongs to the gods alone.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160305_Lines: You are living proof that even the most brilliant mortal is a fool, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160134_Lines: Even a god gets tired sometimes.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160113_Lines: It's the green monster I want anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160303_Lines: The mighty Magneto. We have much in common.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160004_Lines: I am Loki, God of Mischief and the King of Asgard!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160145_Lines: Well, this is a place one cannot leave quickly enough.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160101_Lines: Whoa, just another soldier, after all.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160226_Lines: Oh dear. Bit of a drop there.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160072_Lines: Ouch it hurts… No I lied.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160225_Lines: Ouch. It is a long way down.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160037_Lines: Oh, this is hardly the only world.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160353_Lines: Hmph. A paltry showing compared to the glorious Archive of Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160121_Lines: Ehhh, they dare to lay hands on ME?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160291_Lines: Ah, the legend himself. The Jade Giant. The Taciturn Terror.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160330_Lines: Ah, the king of Midgard's seas. Have you come to pledge your fealty?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160031_Lines: Oh I did. Several times. Lovely torture machines.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160029_Lines: Oh, spare me your heroic platitudes, brother.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160323_Lines: Well… I suppose I am due to learn a few new tricks…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160294_Lines: I know you believe that. But time, as we shall see, doesn't always move in a straight line…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160312_Lines: You are among the few mortals who could prove me wrong, Strange. You're welcome to try.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160355_Lines: This is a place where kings are made. Kneel now and save yourself the embarrassment.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160132_Lines: Form up here! Don't waste my time!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160013_Lines: Mantis, yes, I'm a GOD, but stop staring at~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160039_Lines: Well dear, how ELSE is anything  done in this universe?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160189_Lines: Cosmic yarn will no longer be amplified here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160317_Lines: Your Majesty. Splendid empire you have here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160390_Lines: How dare you insult the king of Yggsgard so?!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160181_Lines: Ms. Parker has left us a gift.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160352_Lines: Tread lightly. Odin is trying to sleep. Hopefully, for many centuries to come…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160318_Lines: And so we shall…at least with yours.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160391_Lines: Absolutely not! I am part Frost Giant. There is an enormous difference!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160143_Lines: When Doom has been brought to heel, I will choose Asgard's future.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160380_Lines: Bravo, Hela. We still have much to do…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160129_Lines: In a few moments, you shall see the extraordinary power of the trickster god!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160421_Lines: Clearly, you have never met my father Odin…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160016_Lines: loyalty is a powerful bond… and also a terrible weakness.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160157_Lines: We will soon be out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160177_Lines: The Punisher has become a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160193_Lines: The Punisher is out of his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160011_Lines: I too am a son of Odin.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160240_Lines: We have not yet reached the heart of the Web.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160280_Lines: We must make this territory ours.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160270_Lines: Here we must make our stand!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160281_Lines: This is the place we must defend!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160408_Lines: We must deliver this dark essence beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160227_Lines: We are at a numerical disadvantage.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160158_Lines: Our attack is about to fail! Finish them!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160238_Lines: We really must move this operation along.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160332_Lines: We have both adorned ourselves in gold. What have you beneath that shimmering skin that makes you any better than I?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160034_Lines: I consider many things. But not that.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160094_Lines: I am more than just a trickster.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160009_Lines: I can be anyone, but I choose to be Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160324_Lines: I am here to defend the Web, just as you are.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160196_Lines: I have wrecked the spider nest!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160202_Lines: I am a true team player.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160042_Lines: I am Loki… or am I?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160237_Lines: I have met Bast. I suggest we do not disappoint her…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160141_Lines: I have seen many futures, and most of them are bad.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160138_Lines: I am wily, unreliable, vindictive…and yet oddly compelling. Don't you think?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160327_Lines: Perhaps you have not yet brought him the right nuts?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160245_Lines: I suspect T'Challa is growing impatient…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160300_Lines: Too grand to put in a nutshell, dear.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160306_Lines: I'm saying that you have spent your life trying to surpass your father, so you should understand what you see here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160128_Lines: My sorcery still needs time to prepare.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160284_Lines: Escort this conveyance where it must go.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160285_Lines: Trap this vehicle and stop it.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160326_Lines: How can I usurp what was destined to be mine? Come, let us see if Ratatoskr is in the World-Tree.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160090_Lines: They are in front of us. Idiots.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160266_Lines: The enemy was here, and might well be again.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160228_Lines: They are many and we are few.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160416_Lines: So I have been told, by the All-Father and countless others.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160282_Lines: Hold this place at all costs!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160007_Lines: Time has unravelled. Who will stitch it together again? Me.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160271_Lines: A defensible spot. We shall use it!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160028_Lines: Though most unlike how either of us pictured.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160249_Lines: It is prudent to withdraw for the moment.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160194_Lines: That's the last of the spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160010_Lines: Some may call this entanglement CHAOS; I only see… opportunities.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160002_Lines: I am accused of loving chaos. It is True.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160084_Lines: Has anyone bothered to consider a defense?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160297_Lines: You must teach me some of your chaos magic, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160198_Lines: Raise your heads, friends! The sniper is gone.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160179_Lines: A nest of mechanical spiders? Lunacy!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160142_Lines: Doom has overreached, and we must correct him.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160331_Lines: Such fire for one so unusually damp. We should get along swimmingly!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160313_Lines: Welcome, Sorcerer Supreme. Asgard has need of your powers.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160218_Lines: I am, after all, a god.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160165_Lines: Nothing keeps me down for long.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160304_Lines: Quite so. For a mortal you are very perspicacious.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160290_Lines: I'm right here. With healing magic.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160348_Lines: Loki does not ask for much from his loyal subjects. Just their undying adoration.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160309_Lines: Our father is old, and tired, brother. And a new war needs new stories, does it not?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160357_Lines: These Wakandans should consider praying to a different god. I happen to be free…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160020_Lines: Well well, the Mutant Goddess of Krakoa! It's been a while.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160319_Lines: Splendid. Another mortal warrior, at my service.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160109_Lines: I only wish I had done it myself!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160102_Lines: Pathetic, I'll make a better Supreme!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160244_Lines: Quite a spectacular setting…but we cannot stop to savor its beauty.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160329_Lines: Perfect. Why bother being worthy when your friends can do the heavy lifting for you eh?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160124_Lines: That's right, let your enemies underestimate you.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160005_Lines: God of Lies? If you wish. What society can exist without lies?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160385_Lines: I had more tricks than they had arms.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160032_Lines: And I shall, your unholiness, right after I have my time to rule!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160400_Lines: Knull shall be brought low by his own essence! The irony!
