122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290012_Lines: When I was little, I was taught that 'power corrupts only if you allow it'.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290135_Lines: We saving the normies from themselves again?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290265_Lines: We have to keep pushing ahead.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290069_Lines: We need to finish them off now!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290320_Lines: Let's deliver this essence beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290006_Lines: I was an ordinary mutant girl until my soul got put through a demonic blender.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290105_Lines: I climbed out of Limbo, THIS is nothing.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290139_Lines: We need Squirrel Girl along as an interpreter.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290007_Lines: My brother and I are about as different as we could be.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290137_Lines: I like that attitude. Let's rock.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290122_Lines: Let me get this straight… You have telepathic control over squirrels and you're not a mutant?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290093_Lines: I'm gonna miss that pop-star charisma.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290270_Lines: Hard to tell any difference. Limbo's always kind of scrambled.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290017_Lines: I don't really let people — or demons — tell me what to do.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290002_Lines: I have mutant powers, and a little demonic magic too.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290005_Lines: Me? Just a demon-haunted mutant girl out to save the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290032_Lines: I'm Magik, and this is my Soulsword.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290305_Lines: I am the Queen of Limbo, Logan. The time for joy is long gone.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290123_Lines: I'm not sure Xavier really does that.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290189_Lines: I didn't even use the sharp end.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290009_Lines: I forged my sword with my very soul, there's no spell it cannot cut through.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290197_Lines: You have to feed them sometimes.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290339_Lines: I bring the demons, you bring the souls, right? Sounds like a party.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290003_Lines: My soul remains noble, as my sword stays bright.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290176_Lines: I took care of the amplifier!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290228_Lines: What are we, tourists? We have to move faster.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290248_Lines: Let's rip this place to shreds!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290218_Lines: And now we guide Spider-Zero straight into the Shrine of the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290342_Lines: Our foes would be wise not to underestimate us.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290024_Lines: Aren't you worried about my dark side anymore, Stephen?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290222_Lines: On our way with the Statue of Bast…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290230_Lines: Clock's ticking. We need to get there fast.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290232_Lines: Heart-Shaped Herb plus chronovium? I'd like a taste, sure.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290193_Lines: You let Darkchild out to play…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290013_Lines: YOU did, Ororo. A different you, a different place.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290090_Lines: Way to get your Darkforce on!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290011_Lines: Storm, hope you brought your heaviest weather.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290134_Lines: Something big and nasty is knocking on the door in here…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290288_Lines: I'll get you where you need to be.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290053_Lines: Fight me now, I pity you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290321_Lines: Knull's reign ends here and now!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290276_Lines: He's out there somewhere. I'll find him.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290121_Lines: No.Today we're on the same side.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290307_Lines: We call them demons where I come from… but yes.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290124_Lines: Yeah. Part of it's a sword now.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290045_Lines: Healing? Why would I need that?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290158_Lines: Stay away from these things when they're levitating.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290329_Lines: Now's our chance to finish Knull. Don't waste it!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290247_Lines: Keep an eye on this place.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290043_Lines: I don't fear pain. I fear failure.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290136_Lines: We're going to need some fancy swordplay to get us out of here in one piece.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290289_Lines: Looks like Namor brought in his own creepy army.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290219_Lines: We're headed straight for the Rift, looks like. Fun times.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290021_Lines: Seriously? You never thought about letting it go?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290216_Lines: Sabotaging Loki's tapping operation? Count me in!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290166_Lines: Keep your distance from the spider nest!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290292_Lines: So much for Namor's cephalopod soldiers.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290290_Lines: It's an octopus party… and we're all invited!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290291_Lines: Squids? And I thought my demons were hideous…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290127_Lines: Let's circle back after we defeat Doom and put space-time back in its bottle, shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290344_Lines: We need to hit them fast and hard. I'll take point. Namor, I want you to --
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290096_Lines: Logan's down? How is that possible?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290284_Lines: Fancy seeing you off the island, old man.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290275_Lines: I haven't seen him since Doom did this.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290181_Lines: All done with the spider nest.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290180_Lines: The spider nest is all cleared out.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290220_Lines: Spider-Zero, in the Spider-Buggy, on her way to save the world.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290221_Lines: Drive it like you stole it, Spider-Zero. Let's roll.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290277_Lines: Rule the demonic hordes of Limbo for long enough and they're bound to rub off on you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290271_Lines: Always. He wants into this world, badly.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290112_Lines: Can somebody get me some healing?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290016_Lines: Belasco said I should stay away from you. He really hates you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290274_Lines: Watch me fight and you'll see.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290229_Lines: Kick that Spider-Buggy into a higher gear! We're low on time.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290132_Lines: A web that size must have a gigantic spider in the middle.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290026_Lines: Depends on who I'm talking to. Are you Spector, or Khonshu?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290019_Lines: This isn't a pop song, Luna. Real life is complicated.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290131_Lines: Only place I've ever seen more depressing than Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290078_Lines: This war is bigger than one life.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290272_Lines: It's not actual fire. It's soulfire.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290233_Lines: That web…it brings together every dimension. Even some I've never seen. Nicely done, Master Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290014_Lines: You on the side of the good guys this time?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290029_Lines: This hall reeks ancient evil. It doesn't belong on Earth!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290234_Lines: There's power here. Real power, like I haven't felt since Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290204_Lines: None left for you guys, sorry!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290018_Lines: But would he be worse than Khonshu?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290163_Lines: Look out, Punisher's in his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290129_Lines: Cool. Mine has a piece of my soul.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290004_Lines: The Soulsword can destroy just about anything.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290079_Lines: That's why they call me Magik.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290031_Lines: Magik's here, and I brought a little Limbo with me.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290205_Lines: Darkchild gets greedy sometimes, doesn't she?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290239_Lines: The Darkchild is ready to awaken!

122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300166_Lines: Only one of us gets to play with Khonshu's toys!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300182_Lines: This doesn't mean we're a team now…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300337_Lines: Not used to being on a planet without a moon…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300133_Lines: Quite the empire you've built here, Panther.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300083_Lines: People forget how tough Spidey is.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300038_Lines: I can't heal? Well, that sucks.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300263_Lines: Don't give them the advantage here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300274_Lines: If I'm on your side, isn't that what you want?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300221_Lines: The tree is dead ahead. Don't stop now!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300025_Lines: Hydra made a bargain with an ancient evil.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300107_Lines: The moon is bright. Khonshu's hunt is about to begin.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300057_Lines: We need to seize control? Sounds fun.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300059_Lines: I'll be disappointed if they're no show!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300058_Lines: They'll be coming soon. Khonshu protect us.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300018_Lines: C'mon, you KNOW Apocalypse's out of his mind warring against the GODS.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300132_Lines: He's heard of you... and he says you're lucky we're on the same side.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300007_Lines: You guys are actually here, right? Or am I imagining this?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300183_Lines: You're lucky. I usually work alone.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300011_Lines: Did you bring your squirrelly little pals?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300191_Lines: You can't hide from your destiny.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300019_Lines: You are actually here, right? Or am I imagining this?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300293_Lines: Look at you, glimmering like a golden sun. Khonshu wouldn't like you one bit.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300216_Lines: Think you can navigate these webs, kid?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300301_Lines: Either you're on my side or you're next in line to fall.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300331_Lines: It's my sworn duty to protect travelers in the night.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300064_Lines: On your toes. Here they come.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300267_Lines: Don't let them go another inch.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300212_Lines: Let's get to that tree and get this over with.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300222_Lines: Come on! The web is waiting for us!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300217_Lines: Hope you filled the tank, Zero. It's go time.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300203_Lines: Don't pick a fight with vengeance personified.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300175_Lines: Castle's turret won't bother us anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300249_Lines: Here's where they've been hiding out!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300125_Lines: Well, that tells me everything I need to know about you.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300164_Lines: Took out the other Moon Knight's ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300271_Lines: Just listening to Khonshu babbling in my head. Again.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300195_Lines: One for Steven. One for Jake. One for me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300266_Lines: Move this thing forward. Or else.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300158_Lines: Ugh. You and your giant weapons, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300138_Lines: Whew. Almost didn't make it. Again.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300160_Lines: Whoa. Where can I get a turret like that?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300052_Lines: Whoa I can think straight, thanks!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300201_Lines: Huh. I was just getting started…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300102_Lines: Ghhh… I've came back from far worse than THAT.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300124_Lines: That'd be Khonshu. God of the Moon… and of Vengeance.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300127_Lines: Huh… Wonder if I could trade an Egyptian Moon God for one of their Orisha…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300024_Lines: Hm. 'Doc Samson'. Read his file. Is he gonna help me like how he did you? is he gonna pull Khonshu out?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300210_Lines: Hey! How come there are so many of them?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300275_Lines: You're not as crazy as I am.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300023_Lines: Nobody goes it alone in these times. We can't afford to.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300330_Lines: She's great. But no one would take me seriously if I busted skulls wearing a hippo costume!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300119_Lines: Khonshu seems to be enjoying "the end of all that is" a bit too much…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300082_Lines: Khonshu made me do it, Panther!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300116_Lines: Khonshu guides me. Just… not always in the right direction…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300247_Lines: Khonshu has his eye on you…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300106_Lines: You will feel the wrath of Khonshu!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300226_Lines: Khonshu says we can not  fail Wakanda.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300262_Lines: Khonshu says to claim this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300297_Lines: Khonshu gave me my mission. And nothing's going to stop me from seeing it through.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300299_Lines: They don't believe you're real, Khonshu. I'll make sure they regret that…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300146_Lines: Come on, Khonshu! Let me rest!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300154_Lines: An ankh? Hey! That's my trick!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300229_Lines: The rich just keep getting richer. Some things never change…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300150_Lines: Thought I was the one who worked from the shadows…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300084_Lines: Frank's doing what he does best.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300049_Lines: Better put this to good use.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300220_Lines: Almost to the magic tree. Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300174_Lines: You can't be trusted with firepower like that, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300036_Lines: I'm not afraid of your damage.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300120_Lines: I'm not really a team guy. I've got more than enough voices in my head.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300004_Lines: Camouflage is stupid. I want the enemy to see me…and be afraid.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300245_Lines: We could do a ton of damage here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300252_Lines: We could make our stand here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300261_Lines: We need to take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300003_Lines: Khonshu has guided me this far. I trust him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300040_Lines: My weak is better than your strong.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300056_Lines: I'm hearing voices. They say lock and load.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300061_Lines: I'll draw their attention, you take the zone!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300180_Lines: I took that sniper off the board.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300290_Lines: I squished those squids for you.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300178_Lines: I think I got all the spider-bots.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300140_Lines: Time is running out. I think…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300118_Lines: I like you. For now. But trust me, that could change in a heartbeat.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300253_Lines: I bet we could hold 'em off from here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300092_Lines: I tried to keep him out of trouble, but he wouldn't listen.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300002_Lines: I'm the Fist of Khonshu, protector of the overnight travelers.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300329_Lines: I'm the Fist of Khonshu, God of the Moon.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300257_Lines: I mean, it's not my fault an Egyptian god whispers in my brain and tells me who deserves his righteous vengeance.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300006_Lines: I'm Marc Spector, I'm Steven Grant, I'm Jake Lockley. And we are Moon Knight.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300069_Lines: I am the light in the darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300151_Lines: I was a mercenary. I know how to spot a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300131_Lines: I only serve one god. His name is Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300272_Lines: Yeah, I wouldn't exactly call it that. But maybe you scored a better god.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300292_Lines: Great, now my fists are all slimy...
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300009_Lines: I do hear voices in my head. You would too, if you listened.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300010_Lines: There's a god living in my head, I… don't know what to think.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300008_Lines: I wear white for a reason. I want the bad guys to see me coming.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300343_Lines: I sense this boy's power, my champion. Do not challenge him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300326_Lines: I know Iron Fist, kid. You're not him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300234_Lines: I'm almost ready, Khonshu. Gimme a minute…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300122_Lines: So… you commune with ancient gods once in a blue moon, right, Doc?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300311_Lines: Sorry, Knull, but the dark belongs to Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300207_Lines: You really should watch where you step.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300328_Lines: Well, when I'm done here, you'll have plenty of folks to heal. Trust me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300209_Lines: More enemies out there than voices in my head.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300211_Lines: More of them than us? This'll be fun.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300157_Lines: Strange is teleporting around. Watch out.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300318_Lines: Time's running out. Let's get underground!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300121_Lines: Yeah. But it didn't last long. And I burned my ID card.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300123_Lines: Yeah, I… probably shouldn't comment. Khonshu is always listening.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300206_Lines: The moon is out… and so are you.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300255_Lines: The Moon is white, Stark. It shines in the night. So do I.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300001_Lines: I tear through the cloudless night, just like the moon.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300176_Lines: Down came the moon and stomped the spiders out!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300060_Lines: Moon's right. The time to attack is now.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300259_Lines: Anyone want to lend a hand?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300283_Lines: Friends call me Marc… or Steven... or Jake.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300075_Lines: The squirrels are going to hate me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300085_Lines: The Squirrels get the win? Really?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300021_Lines: Justice is like the moon, if you look up hard enough in the dark, you'll find it.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300256_Lines: I try to do the right thing, but people always end up thinking I'm crazy!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300117_Lines: I'm used to fighting on the streets. Not across all space and time.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300276_Lines: Don't know, don't care. One moon is more than enough for me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300254_Lines: Yeah, and I got friends to help.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300169_Lines: The raccoon's beacon is outta commission.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300310_Lines: Let's get beneath the surface and finish Knull!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300288_Lines: Squids? Good. More arms to break.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300110_Lines: The full moon is high in the sky.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300181_Lines: That should take care of our little sniper issue.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300149_Lines: A sniper? Clever. Annoying… but clever.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300128_Lines: Now I sorta wish I hadn't worn all white…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300233_Lines: All out of vengeance at the moment…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300215_Lines: Reality isn't gonna save itself. Let's roll!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300300_Lines: Richards and Stark think they know everything. But when man plans, the gods laugh.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300235_Lines: Ready for some sweet, sweet vengeance.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300279_Lines: No. He is nearer than ever. Soon we will all see him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300332_Lines: We'd make a good team. If you ever decide to ditch that Dagger chick, let me know…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300126_Lines: Look at this place! Hydra's crazier than I am!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300287_Lines: Look. It's Namor's disgusting pets. Yay.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300294_Lines: Wish I could get the voices out of my head that easy. Maybe you can teach me a few tricks after all of this is over.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300338_Lines: Really? Think it's got room for one more? Khonshu can be a bit of a pain…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300327_Lines: The worst part about white costumes? The blood stains. Am I right?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300153_Lines: Wait… I didn't put that ankh there? Did I?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300291_Lines: Keep your ugly friends in the sea, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300074_Lines: Good riddance. That guy's a psycho.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300225_Lines: Get that Spider-Buggy into gear, kid!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300319_Lines: Knull does not get the chance to rise, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300227_Lines: Keep moving. We've got an intergalactic empire to save.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300134_Lines: Stars are cool. But do you happen to have any moons?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300115_Lines: Being a living avatar of vengeance takes a lot out of a guy…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300130_Lines: I'm not perfect, but Khonshu seems to think I'm worthy enough.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300223_Lines: Don't even think of slowing down now, spider!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300244_Lines: Let's mess this place up real good.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300080_Lines: Seriously, how many gods ARE there?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300044_Lines: Who wants a piece of me now?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300298_Lines: Anyone who makes the night a more dangerous place needs to be taken out.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300218_Lines: Khonshu and Bast are old friends. Let's do this for them.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300163_Lines: Found some sort of spider nest. Gross.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300156_Lines: Not cool sneaking up on us, Strange.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300139_Lines: Move it or we lose it!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300099_Lines: At least I didn't wake up in a crazy house again.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300289_Lines: I like a good challenge, Namor. Thanks.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300204_Lines: Shouldn't have pissed off the God of Vengeance…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300073_Lines: Khonshu willed it, Spider. Blame him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300053_Lines: This is as close as I ever get to pure.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300251_Lines: The perfect place for a battle…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300078_Lines: Even I think you're crazy, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300171_Lines: That cosmic amplifier is scrap now.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300159_Lines: That turret is absolutely absurd. But kinda cool.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300129_Lines: Nice hammer. Can I borrow it until we finish saving your realm?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300258_Lines: Could use a bit of help…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300017_Lines: Magik, can we talk? While we're on the same side?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300015_Lines: Magik, please! You're helping Apocalypse ascend to GODHOOD! Do you know what comes after?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300219_Lines: Panther needs us to get the job done.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300228_Lines: Their gods look so much cooler than mine…

122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310035_Lines: …Well, we are in the right place for that. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310006_Lines: 4L1T was my life — but wouldn't it be fabulous to have an all-super hero band?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310002_Lines: All I ever wanted to do was sing, really.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310342_Lines: This statue is sacred. Let's get it where it needs to be.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310217_Lines: I couldn't rest until I paid you back.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310030_Lines: Okay! I'll let you show me.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310117_Lines: Not gonna lie, that symbiote is scary.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310102_Lines: We can't just stand around. Let's attack!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310233_Lines: Yggdrasil's roots are drying. We have to speed up!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310016_Lines: They say that music brings the world together, but right now I think we need super heroes for that.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310045_Lines: Tokyo? I love playing Tokyo! But this one is a lot more…spidery?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310302_Lines: Maybe… but I've always preferred the cold!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310018_Lines: Swap? You should just be asking for mine. When's the last time you sold out Stark Arena, gramps?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310118_Lines: Whaaaat? Did I just beat Thor?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310172_Lines: An open portal! The enemy will be coming!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310026_Lines: But we both understand light and dark. How they move together. How they need each other. See?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310123_Lines: Magnetism can't handle a deep freeze.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310046_Lines: Has your Tokyo always looked like this?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310128_Lines: Love those light daggers! Darkforce cloak, too!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310032_Lines: No, but you should know magnetism doesn't work on super-cooled materials. Guess what I can do?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310292_Lines: That's one ugly back-up band, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310125_Lines: You're amazing. I wish I could do what you do!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310204_Lines: You're a little underdressed, aren't you?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310301_Lines: An Agents of Atlas reunion tour? Hmmm… I don't know…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310205_Lines: Can't fight a real freeze. You’re practically a block of ice.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310004_Lines: Superpowers are amazing. Also the ice effects look great on stage.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310213_Lines: I kind of went solo, didn't I?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310063_Lines: Do I throw like a girl?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310275_Lines: Don't let them take this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310280_Lines: Don't let them drive any further!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310188_Lines: Get out of the turret and face us, Punisher!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310238_Lines: Hurry, the show is almost over!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310235_Lines: We are moving too slowly! The Web is fraying.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310025_Lines: Dagger! I feel like you're a kindred spirit. You're a dancer, just like me.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310294_Lines: The only octopus I like is grilled!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310208_Lines: This counts as a hot streak!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310047_Lines: Um, yeah. But there isn't a giant spiderweb in the sky.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310023_Lines: Whoa, what year is it where you come from?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310184_Lines: Oh, were you looking for an armor pack? Too bad.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310058_Lines: Hey, I'm right here! Remember? Luna Snow?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310131_Lines: Omona, not Jeff! He was the best little Landshark…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310224_Lines: We won’t stop until the tapping is stopped.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310009_Lines: It's easier being a super hero when you already have the fame part figured out.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310158_Lines: Wow. For a girl with ice powers, I suddenly feel pretty uncool.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310156_Lines: Oh my God, you're right, I'm gonna…gonna get old someday! And then I'm going to...Ohhh, man, I need to chill out!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310170_Lines: Doctor Strange has opened a portal!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310154_Lines: Okay, confession time. Around you I feel kind of inferior. I mean, you can do everything I can do, and so much more.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310119_Lines: If he's the perfect human, what does that make me?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310229_Lines: If Spider-Zero does not reach Budokan, she cannot reach the Shrine of the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310185_Lines: This thing was called a Cosmic Yarn Amplifier?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310179_Lines: I put the ankh on ice.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310011_Lines: I'd rather make music than do anything else…except be a super hero.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310029_Lines: Well, look at you! Are you a super hero? What can you do?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310174_Lines: Danger! The Punisher's Culling Turret is active!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310101_Lines: This is it, right? We attack?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310121_Lines: Take your squirrels back to a tree!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310115_Lines: What do I do for an encore?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310234_Lines: We have little time. Spider-Zero must reach the Web!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310173_Lines: The Punisher is in turret mode!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310228_Lines: I always wanted to play Budokan…but instead I will escort Spider-Zero there.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310199_Lines: I don't have to be center stage.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310241_Lines: These are sounds I never heard before! Rock on, spiders!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310273_Lines: We can totally take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310239_Lines: We'd better hurry. I don't want to end up on Bast's bad side!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310276_Lines: We have to protect this area.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310237_Lines: We must reach the entrance to the shrine, now!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310231_Lines: Let's go! This place makes my heart sing. So magnificent!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310057_Lines: It's just Luna Snow over here, part-time international pop star and full-time super hero…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310001_Lines: I'm Luna Snow. Like the moon, I shine in darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310343_Lines: I usually like the underground scene… but now I'm not so sure…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310141_Lines: I've still got songs to sing!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310120_Lines: I really didn't want to get a shark bite.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310211_Lines: I owe it all to my fans!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310051_Lines: So Knull is like your god?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310042_Lines: So this is the future…or one future, anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310258_Lines: I found one of our critics…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310222_Lines: We need to get the band together.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310230_Lines: Escorting a magic statue to a hall full of gods? I feel like I'm in an ancient myth!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310097_Lines: Now we really have to fight.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310116_Lines: Yeah, that was me taking down Loki! That's right!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310013_Lines: 따스한 하얀 눈으로 널 감싸 안아（Warm snow surrounds you.）
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310020_Lines: Super hero! As a role model, I mean. Did you really go time-traveling with Krakoa?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310010_Lines: Part of me just wants to get back home, but I know I'm needed here.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310126_Lines: Jeff, you're just the cutest thing!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310014_Lines: Doctor Doom tore everything apart. I want to be part of putting it back together.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310198_Lines: It's okay. Admit it. You need me.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310129_Lines: Peni! It should have been me…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310196_Lines: I put the sniper on ice.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310278_Lines: No stopping now. Let's move this thing!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310149_Lines: This is no time to go solo.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310103_Lines: We have to break through now!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310255_Lines: Keep an eye on this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310214_Lines: What can I say? Star power.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310163_Lines: All of us have a part to play, right?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310036_Lines: Love your sword, but don't melt my ice!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310038_Lines: I am? Amazing! I didn't think aliens listened to K-Pop.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310257_Lines: Hit this place hard and watch the show!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310012_Lines: When all this is over, I'm going to drop the dopest album any timeline has ever heard!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310075_Lines: Oh no, I can't get healed!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310352_Lines: Knull's too dangerous. The universe can't afford an encore!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310291_Lines: Namor let in some party crashers!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310027_Lines: Namor! Someday I'd like to see Talokan.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310351_Lines: We can't let Knull make a comeback!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310122_Lines: You should be playing shuffleboard, old man.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310240_Lines: Clogs to clogs in three generations. That's the saying, anyway... right, Tony?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310040_Lines: It's pretty exciting to partner up with a real X-Man! A dream come true!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310157_Lines: It's always an honor to meet a fan!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310007_Lines: As bad as things get, I try to stay positive.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310226_Lines: Spider-Zero must reach the shrine. Let's get this show on the road!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310227_Lines: Spider-Zero, I promise you will reach the Web.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310039_Lines: Sounds like you need to talk to my manager.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310056_Lines: Luna Snow could bring a little star power to your group!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310142_Lines: Someone needs a snowball in the face.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310015_Lines: Honestly? I didn't like snow growing up.  Halmoni always tried to throw snowballs with me though.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310159_Lines: Are you, like, really the goddess of the underworld?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310270_Lines: I need backup… and I don't mean dancers!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310160_Lines: Gamsahamnida. When this is over, maybe you could add me to your playlist.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310344_Lines: Let's deliver Knull's essence below the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310008_Lines: I didn't always love my powers, but now I think they're great!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310127_Lines: Just like I saw on TV!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310284_Lines: Come here and let me help.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310283_Lines: Over here. I can heal you.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310245_Lines: Not ready to perform quite yet.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310242_Lines: This is nothing like the Tokyo I remember…but it's amazing!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310043_Lines: There isn='t much music in a place like this.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310044_Lines: This place makes my skin crawl.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310162_Lines: If ever a place needed some light, this is it. Good thing you're here.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310059_Lines: I'm ready to put on a show!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310263_Lines: This is where we need to attack.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310167_Lines: It's one of Moon Knight's ankhs!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310132_Lines: How could that happen to the Hulk?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310256_Lines: Perfect place to do some damage!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310053_Lines: So how did you end up here?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310005_Lines: Music makes people happy. Heroes make them safe. Maybe I can do both!

122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320208_Lines: And you folks can get some next time!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320114_Lines: We're not getting anywhere without a fight…so let's fight!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320044_Lines: Wait, you didn't have squirrels on Planet X? That's a bummer!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320168_Lines: What is this turret thing? No fair!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320060_Lines: Hey listen, I'm not afraid of spiders, but gross...
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320122_Lines: They got the drop on you!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320281_Lines: Let's claim this place in the name of squirrel-kind!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320048_Lines: Okay, I'mma tell tippy-toe to bite you.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320022_Lines: Oh hey Spider-Man, I heard you're helping with the TRD.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320054_Lines: So what, you never cut anybody a break?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320072_Lines: You want to eat a symbiote? No I don't think that's a good idea.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320080_Lines: Where do you think you're going?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320132_Lines: I'm a problem your gun can't solve, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320384_Lines: You know how you have all the powers of a spider and all the powers of a man?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320070_Lines: I wonder if it grows nuts.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320040_Lines: Are there squirrels in your…your place?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320005_Lines: Being a super hero is a piece of cake compared to being Luke Cage's nanny. Now that was stressful!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320033_Lines: Ya, All you have to do is listen! They really hate Doom.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320003_Lines: I think a lot of villains are just hurt and scared. It would be really nice to help them. After I ping an acorn off their foreheads.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320018_Lines: Hey make fun of my tail all you want, but I've still beaten Doom, Thanos, and Galactus.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320014_Lines: When Doom sees me, he's gonna be shaking in his faceplate.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320107_Lines: High five, Tippy-Toe! We did it!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320222_Lines: Don't worry, Spider-Zero. We'll get you where you need to go.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320059_Lines: Hey check out that amazing tree, Tippy! But watch out for Ratatoskr.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320243_Lines: Well it takes a while to gather that many squirrels.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320035_Lines: Hmmm to what end? To... What... End…?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320096_Lines: Whew, I was hurting for a certain.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320409_Lines: Whew! That's good to know. I was a little bit worried!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320057_Lines: I mean, have you met me? Tippy-toe, meet Moon Knight!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320214_Lines: Ohh, that's a long way down.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320064_Lines: OMG a modest king. Hashtag heartthrob! Uh sorry I mean that professionally!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320028_Lines: Hey, cool, uh, doodads and majiggies.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320045_Lines: Oh, look at you! You're so cute! It's nice to finally team up with somebody just like me!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320030_Lines: Oh, holy walnuts, book me a ticket!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320062_Lines: Woo! Spooky. Hey Tip don't look.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320388_Lines: Ooh! I always wanted to learn magic! Tippy loves a good card trick!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320267_Lines: Ohh, this must be their nest.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320299_Lines: Too many tentacles! Yikes! Too many tentacles!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320133_Lines: Aw, it's never nice seeing a tree fall.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320115_Lines: Oh! We're up against it! Gotta fight harder!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320136_Lines: Oh, no, her fans are gonna be so mad at me.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320180_Lines: Oh, Rocket's yarn thing is smashed! Awe so sad.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320195_Lines: Aw, I love my knuckle spikes!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320143_Lines: Aw! Look at his poor bushy tail.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320119_Lines: Uh oh, Ah! they don't look friendly.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320232_Lines: Oh! Can't this thing go any faster?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320102_Lines: Who gave me this awesome shield?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320034_Lines: Ugh, Loki, what mischief art thou up to THIS time?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320031_Lines: Oh, that god of goop is gonna get a symbiote smackdown.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320068_Lines: Ya I dunno, our last meeting didn't go so well.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320304_Lines: Some things are beyond even me.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320414_Lines: Yeah, ok. No, I thought so, thank you. I shouldn't... I shouldn't have asked. I shouldn't have even thought it. I shouldn't have pictured it. I'm sorry for picturing it. This is my fault. I'm gonna go. I'm gonna do a lap. Oh... can I wash my brain?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320004_Lines: Hello, my name is Doreen Green, and it makes me sad when people don't listen to animals.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320046_Lines: Oh, no... Ah b-but I do have an army of squirrels. Does that count?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320074_Lines: Hey, it's me! Squirrel Girl, in case you couldn't tell that gaint squirrel-like features.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320002_Lines: Hey don't ever call Tippy-Toe a pet ok? She's my best friend.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320392_Lines: Hey! These squirrels are as much a part of this team as you are, buddy!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320354_Lines: We have to go underground? Isn't the surface bad enough?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320261_Lines: Ok! All eyes on this spot, super-pals!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320184_Lines: Hey folks, I have squashed so many spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320139_Lines: My, Jeff. What big teeth you have!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320041_Lines: Oh my, OMG you are the cutest shark ever. Look at your little feet!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320307_Lines: O.M.G.! Aren't you the cutest little thing ever! You should totally join my squad!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320390_Lines: Goddess? Me? Aw, heck, no! I'm just a girl, and these are just my furry little friends!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320047_Lines: Don't yo-No-hey! Don't you say it.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320061_Lines: Woah! Look at this place! They should call it Wow-Kanda if you ask me.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320363_Lines: If we don't get this underground, we're done for!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320001_Lines: If you knew squirrels the way I know squirrels, I think you'd really like them.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320021_Lines: If I ever see Doom again, I'm gonna —
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320111_Lines: Defend like it's your last acorn!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320137_Lines: Ah, That was the perfect human? Haha! Ya right! Haha!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320027_Lines: Oh, oh yeah. They'll chew through anything.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320217_Lines: Way too many bad guys here.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320081_Lines: Hey check out this big acorn! Pew!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320104_Lines: Go on bad guys! Take your best shot!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320393_Lines: You bet! He's said so himself! For every one he flings away, a dozen more vex him!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320313_Lines: For sure! How do you think my best girl earned the name Tippy Toe?!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320052_Lines: Weird, huh? I would totally love to be an honorary X-Man, though.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320391_Lines: Well, any friend of squirrels is a friend of mine, your royal Thor-ness, sir!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320009_Lines: I-I-I do still kind of have a crush on Wolverine.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320011_Lines: Well I-I so I have a genetic anomaly but I'm not a mutant. And-and please don't ask me what the difference is cause I don't know.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320236_Lines: I love giant robots! But that one not so much.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320032_Lines: You guys are the coolest. I always thought so. Now let's kick some butt, shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320058_Lines: I do not like this place. Let's wreck it.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320023_Lines: Yeah, I couldn't either. Uh But I can fight bad guys until the TRD's done and everything goes back to the way it was.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320286_Lines: We cannot let it go any further.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320272_Lines: We need to protect this place.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320235_Lines: T'Challa can't wait forever. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320251_Lines: We gotta get into a big scurry!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320355_Lines: We've gotta make sure Knull doesn't claw his way to freedom.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320287_Lines: We gotta stop them in their tracks!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320117_Lines: We're almost there! All squirrels on deck!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320209_Lines: We ran out of bad guys!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320284_Lines: Should we give this thing a push?Or..
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320226_Lines: Let's move this fancy statue, shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320176_Lines: We wrecked that beacon, didn't we?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320228_Lines: We have to get to that tree!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320179_Lines: I certainly did busted up the yarn doodad!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320010_Lines: When other people first saw my powers. They we're like wait. A squirrel? And now they're like Oh! A squirrel!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320013_Lines: Oh I can handle the Time Entanglement. There's been alternate versions of me forever.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320244_Lines: Could use a couple minutes here…
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320053_Lines: I hear you're a hard case. Real tough guy.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320110_Lines: Oh yeah! I can smell a fight coming my way!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320280_Lines: I think we can take this place!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320237_Lines: I wonder if Ratatoskr is up here…
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320218_Lines: I feel like we need more people.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320019_Lines: Hey I bet I could help with the time-fixing thingamajig. Oh-oh-Ma-Maybe I'll ask Tony next time I see him.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320181_Lines: I got the Punisher out of his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320015_Lines: Hey uh quick que does anybody get the feeling Loki has bigger plans than just ruling Asgard?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320012_Lines: I beat Doctor Doom once, and I'll do it again if he gets in my face.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320200_Lines: Aw! I just love their little spears.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320303_Lines: My pal Tippy-Toe seems to think so. Why?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320065_Lines: I know this isn't the most important thing, what with Loki taking over Asgard, and the Dooms destroying the time stream, but —
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320042_Lines: I know, sharks aren't supposed to have feet! And no, you can't eat Tippy-Toe! She's my best friend.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320051_Lines: Tail-deep in nuts. I don't let him do courier work anymore. How's Trudy?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320177_Lines: No more rebirth from this beacon! Oh that's for sure.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320055_Lines: I feel like we have something in common.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320189_Lines: I got the last shot on this sniper!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320385_Lines: Okay, so here's a question I don't want the answer to. If I can summon an army of rodents to obey my every command, can you—?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320020_Lines: Tony. Are we ever going to fix all this?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320130_Lines: I totally still love ya Tony!!!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320278_Lines: Help! We're getting our tails kicked!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320025_Lines: Ok whatever that means but you're going to fight with us right?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320116_Lines: Tick tick tick! Let's finish the job!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320069_Lines: Yeah, wow, a tree that size must be a really amazing thing for you to see.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320063_Lines: Hey uh can I state the obvious? You've got an incredible kingdom.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320026_Lines: You know, sometimes I wish I had a cool sword…but then I remember I have squirrels.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320297_Lines: Squirrel Girl versus Squid Kids? Let's do this!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320294_Lines: You can always count on squirrels!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320043_Lines: Hey, Groot, don't get mad if some of my pals ride on your branches, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320192_Lines: You can return the favor anytime.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320029_Lines: And big fan of your cute little bushy tail!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320112_Lines: Hey nobody shakes us out of our tree!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320089_Lines: No healing? Ohh… I'm in trouble.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320174_Lines: Honk if you destroyed an ankh!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320186_Lines: The spider-bots are gone. Whew! That was harrowing.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320142_Lines: Now that is some king energy there!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320266_Lines: Keep an eye on this one!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320178_Lines: Ah looks like no cosmic yarn is getting amplified here!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320007_Lines: Oh-Ah my tail ya it's super warm, and it's very handy in combat.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320308_Lines: Wait… quick question, you don't eat squirrel, do you?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320024_Lines: Hold on, you came back from the future to fight with us?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320166_Lines: Oh jeez, the Punisher's in a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320389_Lines: You want pure chaos? Try wrangling an army of hungry squirrels in battle against Thanos!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320362_Lines: Knull sounds awful! We can't let him win!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320298_Lines: My animal pals are way cuter, Namor!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320050_Lines: Oh ok ah, she says you should mind your own spiders and go knit them tiny socks. Sorry! She's going through something.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320248_Lines: Tippy Toe says we're ready to go!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320120_Lines: Tippy-Toe spotted bad guys! There they are!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320227_Lines: Hey Tippy! No building nests on Bast's head!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320128_Lines: A spider's no match for a squirrel!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320134_Lines: Honestly Raccoons shouldn't carry gunss always been my opinion.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320172_Lines: Hey is it bad luck to destroy an ankh?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320016_Lines: Honestly, I'd be surprised if good ole Doomy ISN'T behind a super timey-wimey mess like this.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320221_Lines: Who would hurt such an amazing tree?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320238_Lines: Who knew spiders were so cool? Not me, never would guessed it.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320408_Lines: These symbiotes… They don't snack on squirrels, do they?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320049_Lines: They're so cute aren't they?! But they're still tough, right Tippy?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320160_Lines: Aren't these things a symbol of life?
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320109_Lines: Alright this is where the fight happens, folks.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320153_Lines: I'm not done with this fight yet!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320268_Lines: Ohh, here's where they've been hanging out!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320008_Lines: This is Tippy Toe, and she has the powers of umm a regular  squirrel.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320285_Lines: That vehicle could sure use a push.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320076_Lines: Oh oh! Pick me! Pick Squirrel Girl! That's me! Pick me! Pick me!
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320017_Lines: So wha-So-uh-uh-sorry-who's butt exactly are we kicking? 'Cause I got this villians trivia deck from Deadpool that I think would help.
122_HeroVoice_1032_ST.1032001_HeroVoice_10320157_Lines: Watch your whiskers, Tippy-Toe. There's a sniper.

122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330060_Lines: No. That's one club I couldn't get into and don't want to.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330004_Lines: You don't have to run away from your past. Just look it in the eye and say: I'm better than that now.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330274_Lines: Don't let them get any further.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330142_Lines: No, NOT after everything I've been through in the Red Room!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330121_Lines: Not everything is black and white, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330298_Lines: Fair. By the time I was your age, I was already one of the best spies on the planet...
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330194_Lines: That's five. I'm running out of targets.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330197_Lines: They all went down so easy…
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330225_Lines: Please nobody tell Spider-Ham about this place.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330137_Lines: R and R in a box.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330150_Lines: Portal's wide open. Be ready for an attack.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330052_Lines: No, but if they're smart, they take our advice.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330176_Lines: You let me get too close.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330297_Lines: You're the one trying to hold reality together? You're just a kid.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330030_Lines: Where'd you learn how to pilot an armored suit?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330291_Lines: The way you move... You're an assassin, just like me, aren't you?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330359_Lines: With skills like yours, it's a good thing the X-Men got you out of Russia at an early age.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330034_Lines: Decided to join the rest of humanity against the enemy that might destroy our whole timestream?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330119_Lines: Wish you were on the right side, Bruce.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330053_Lines: Nothing like this in the Japan you remember, is there?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330044_Lines: You haven't designed those life-extension treatments yet? Better get to it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330218_Lines: Stay sharp. We're not there yet.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330009_Lines: Sometimes the right thing is the hardest thing. Do it anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330025_Lines: Clint, there's nobody I'd rather save the world with than you.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330103_Lines: Hit'em harder, we're almost out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330344_Lines: No more delays. We need to get beneath the surface now!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330255_Lines: So this is where they've been hiding…
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330213_Lines: This package is for T'Challa only.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330118_Lines: Imagine how much Tony could have helped.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330021_Lines: Steve! I thought we'd lost you and the Commandos over Latveria!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330029_Lines: Ah, the world-famous Luna Snow. I remember you from a long time ago.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330042_Lines: Hmm..Just like your brother. Like your brother.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330050_Lines: Oh good, you've been here before. You can show me around.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330062_Lines: Attention team, Black Widow is combat-ready.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330048_Lines: An orbiting city around a Vibranium star…Have you ever seen anything like it?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330109_Lines: On your back, on your back!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330288_Lines: My body may look the same, but for me, it's been decades. And I've felt every single day.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330292_Lines: It's in our blood. And in the blood we spill. That part of us never changes.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330284_Lines: Secondary targets neutralized. On to Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330011_Lines: There will always be Avengers. The ones from my world, well...
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330006_Lines: Nothing happens in any world without me knowing about it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330122_Lines: She brought a slingshot to a gunfight.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330022_Lines: Well, you didn't miss much. I lived it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330028_Lines: If you get a crack at Doom, make it count.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330216_Lines: Yggdrasil's going to be drained dry if we don't get there fast.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330098_Lines: To hold this area, we'll have to fight.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330161_Lines: Ankh? I don't see any ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330001_Lines: Spies know that truly observant people are rare. And dangerous.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330257_Lines: This is the place. Let's go.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330360_Lines: You wouldn't have stayed on the farm for long. The Red Room would have snatched you up.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330147_Lines: Give these ankhs a wide berth if you can.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330170_Lines: Turret's destroyed. Watch for the Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330023_Lines: I stopped counting a long time ago.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330153_Lines: Frank always wanted to be a weapon. Now he is.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330027_Lines: Frank. It's been a while since Shanghai.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330130_Lines: Frank remember! Old soldiers never die!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330018_Lines: When this is all said and done, the Red Room will resume business as usual.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330058_Lines: Good. Hang onto that feeling for when we meet Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330101_Lines: They won't leave until we make them.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330002_Lines: I've been around a long time, and I've learned a little too much about how to hurt people.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330154_Lines: Punisher's living his best life…by becoming a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330091_Lines: I always did have a thick skin.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330047_Lines: Tokyo did not look like this last time I was here.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330375_Lines: I've never been here before, but I feel like I know every inch of this planet.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330198_Lines: You started it. I finished it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330250_Lines: We could do some damage here.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330259_Lines: Here's where we make our stand.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330100_Lines: We have to hold this area!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330204_Lines: Numbers are not on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330335_Lines: We have our mission. Stop Knull, no matter what.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330210_Lines: Are we going all the way up in the web?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330273_Lines: We need to stop that vehicle!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330217_Lines: We're not getting there fast enough.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330017_Lines: It doesn't matter if a conflict is geological, commerical or even multiversal, I'd rather end things quitely.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330186_Lines: I like to make it sting.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330188_Lines: How we do it in the Red Room.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330168_Lines: I flushed Frank out of his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330036_Lines: Think we ever have before, in another timeline?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330072_Lines: Come out... Come out wherever you are…
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330212_Lines: We get Spider-Zero to the Weaver. No matter what.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330174_Lines: Told you I knew how to find a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330104_Lines: Time is not on our side. Push the attack!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330199_Lines: It's over when I say it's over.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330059_Lines: It is. Even for Hydra. Don't get separated.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330054_Lines: Lots of huge cities, yeah. This one has more spiders than most.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330037_Lines: More like the future came back, and brought me with it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330020_Lines: More Hulked-up? This I gotta see.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330005_Lines: I was terrorized, broken and remade in the Red Room. Now I command it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330033_Lines: There's a lot of that going around. Maybe Doom can sort it out.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330123_Lines: Sometimes you have to squash a spider.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330211_Lines: Budokan's not getting any closer, people. Let's roll.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330010_Lines: People like Doom always overreach. People like us have to put things back together.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330015_Lines: Doom, Loki, Hela…that's a little too much green. Time to paint things black.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330138_Lines: That put a spring in my step.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330090_Lines: Never say no to a shield.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330132_Lines: Things just got a lot harder without Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330040_Lines: Things are about to get very serious.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330144_Lines: Eyes peeled, people. We got a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330046_Lines: Loki sure has…put his stamp on things around here.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330133_Lines: Hulk's down! Now we have to smash!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330045_Lines: It wouldn't be a Hydra base if it wasn't grandiose and weird.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330163_Lines: Rocket's beacon is no longer broadcasting.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330221_Lines: T'Challa needs this statue now. Hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330051_Lines: T'Challa did it without declaring war on everybody. You should try that.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330035_Lines: A sniper and a ninja. Complementary styles.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330085_Lines: I've got that extra lethal feeling.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330158_Lines: Spider nest! Better clear it out.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330376_Lines: I did. Maybe that bond left behind some sort of... map of home….?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330102_Lines: There's the objective. Let's take it.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330215_Lines: See that tree? We need to get to it now!
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330125_Lines: I guess you are worth the trouble, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330156_Lines: Seems we have a spider infestation.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330039_Lines: Then I guess I've been doing my job right.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330223_Lines: Glad Bucky got out of here.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330008_Lines: Knowing is literally half the battle.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330106_Lines: We're almost there. But not quite.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330032_Lines: You got out of the astral plane?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330220_Lines: Keep pushing! Spider-Zero has to get to the Master Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330061_Lines: I don't even want to know.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330287_Lines: James. It's good to see you again. It's been… too long…
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330286_Lines: A balanced diet. Lots of cardio. And a healthy dose of super soldier serum.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330184_Lines: Nice shot, if I do say so myself.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330014_Lines: Heroes get the job done. In times like these, we can't afford hesitation.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330024_Lines: Don't keep track of that either. But I'm glad to have you back.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330208_Lines: Let's move. Loki doesn't need any more Chronovium.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330049_Lines: Now that I've seen this place, Venom makes more sense.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330278_Lines: Thanks for the clear view, Clint.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330013_Lines: One shot is all I need for a Doombot…no matter what timeline it's from.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330214_Lines: Nobody stops us from getting this statue to T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330003_Lines: I've done things I regret. Now I do things I can be proud of.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330012_Lines: I'm more than a hundred years old. Never would have imagined that back in the day.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330219_Lines: We're not even to Budokan yet. Gotta keep moving.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330222_Lines: Where's the gas pedal on this thing? We need to move.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330343_Lines: This essence is our only hope to stop Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330209_Lines: How do the tires not stick to all these webs?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330149_Lines: Here's an ankh. Moon Knight must be close.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330224_Lines: I feel right at home here. Guess I really am a Black Widow.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330141_Lines: I'll finish the job this time.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330031_Lines: Is she a black widow, by any chance? You know they're the best.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330296_Lines: Then how about we put all our pent up trauma to good use and shut this place down?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330055_Lines: That's a mighty big web. Does it hide giant spiders?
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330126_Lines: He's the best there is, folks. Just ask him.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330016_Lines: Secrets ALWAYS come out, but I'm not afraid of showing the world who I really am.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330200_Lines: You wrote a check you couldn't cash.
122_HeroVoice_1033_ST.1033001_HeroVoice_10330063_Lines: Black Widow is ready to deploy.

122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340008_Lines: Trudy's going to get all this sorted out. All I have to do is build her.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340226_Lines: Snipers don't like it when you get close.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340235_Lines: Pulse cannon ends arguments, tout suite.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340133_Lines: I gotta admit, taking out Star-Lord was satisfying.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340243_Lines: Anybody else got five? Didn't think so.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340111_Lines: Go team go. We're in control.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340002_Lines: People want to be led, I want to be in charge. Win-win.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340334_Lines: Makes it a bit hard to do research when every vessel we've sent out gets sunk by you, buddy...
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340067_Lines: Excellent, we're going steady again. Shall we destroy Hydra?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340332_Lines: You're here? Good thing I replaced most of the metal components in my armor with carbon nanotubes a while back.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340229_Lines: You know you couldn't do this without me.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340415_Lines: You know me. Always eager to improve. New wars call for new weapons, after all.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340005_Lines: If I'm not joking about something, you know I'm not taking it seriously.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340410_Lines: You sure you don't want something a bit more reliable? Maybe some Stark Tech?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340062_Lines: Well, you got your kingdom. How does it feel?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340300_Lines: Hit this spot with everything you have.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340330_Lines: Remind me never to eat squid again…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340261_Lines: Don't you worry, Spider-Zero. We'll get you there.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340015_Lines: Don't bother trying to make people care. Show them what matters to you.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340266_Lines: Better step on it if we're going to get there in time.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340298_Lines: So this is where they've been hiding…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340130_Lines: One step closer to saving the world.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340206_Lines: Watch out, the Punisher's in his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340030_Lines: You been to Krakoa? I'd like to see a sentient island.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340036_Lines: The uh… The stakes have gotten a little bigger than the neighborhood, haven't they?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340248_Lines: Oh, did the rest of you enjoy your little coffee break?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340308_Lines: Uh, anyone got some spare circuits?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340070_Lines: Umm...This is really where you came from?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340272_Lines: We're about to be late for our appointment with the king.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340179_Lines: Ya ok, you know what? How about we focus on the mission instead of my legacy? Thanks.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340056_Lines: Oh-oh okay. Well that's not too shabby. You know I have something like that over there in uh in R&D, and uh and that thing...  You know you don't even have a pool here.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340314_Lines: Oh, we've gotta get this hunk of junk moving!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340293_Lines: Oh, so much to blow up here!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340333_Lines: Right… Remind me whose side you're on again…?
