122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430004_Lines: I found a family out here in space. I'll do whatever it takes to keep them safe.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430222_Lines: Here's a good place to fight back.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430296_Lines: Times like these, I guess it does pay to be...uh...heavily armed. You see what I did there?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430064_Lines: Hang tight. We can do this!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430086_Lines: Your moves are almost as good as mine, Luna!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430171_Lines: Trees make good friends. Let's save this one.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430300_Lines: Great! Great! That's great. Hey, any chance you can find my ship's ion converter? It's gotta be somewhere beneath all this writhing muck.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430104_Lines: Strange conjured up a fancy portal.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430278_Lines: Warlock, old buddy! You look good. Did you get some work done?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430266_Lines: Groot, old buddy! No tree I'd rather see.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430298_Lines: Good to know. Any chance I could sit this one out? No? Cool. Cool cool cool.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430213_Lines: Ho ho! So much stuff to blow up.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430317_Lines: Just curious… Ugh, how did you end up here on Klyntar, Adam?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430179_Lines: If we don't save that tree, Groot is never gonna forgive me!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430354_Lines: There are millions of planets covered in water. I could just drop you off on one of those.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430006_Lines: It's an endless universe, but somehow I keep finding the worst parts.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430168_Lines: How many of them are there?!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430309_Lines: Was that all you've got, Namor? Come on!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430077_Lines: Never bring earth guns to a space gun fight, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430124_Lines: Stick to normal size weapons, okay, Frank?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430099_Lines: Watch out. They've got a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430221_Lines: Gonna have to defend this spot…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430092_Lines: Was looking for one of these.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430212_Lines: Might wanna watch out over here.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430234_Lines: We gotta keep this vehicle moving!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430014_Lines: Oh, Drax is gonna be so mad he missed this!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430184_Lines: Gotta get this statue to T'Challa… or else.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430119_Lines: Had to turn down your amp, Rocket. Sorry not sorry!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430162_Lines: That was a long time coming.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430175_Lines: Almost there. You've got this, Spider-Lady!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430055_Lines: Let's kick some super powered butt!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430183_Lines: The Web is waiting on us. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430062_Lines: Well? Are we doing this or not?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430108_Lines: The Punisher's got some sorta nasty turret.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430107_Lines: The Punisher got an even bigger gun somehow.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430257_Lines: I gotta find them. They're the closest thing I have to family.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430297_Lines: It can't get any worse than my last visit to Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430284_Lines: I've been thinking the same thing… ever since this planet ate our ship!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430318_Lines: Same. Except, you know, we were in our ship. And, you know, we sorta crashed it here.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430335_Lines: Time to get beneath the surface! Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430178_Lines: We gotta get to that tree, fast!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430230_Lines: We gotta get control of this spot!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430133_Lines: We did it! Well, I mean it was mostly me… But we did it!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430336_Lines: The longer we take, the stronger Knull gets. Move it!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430235_Lines: Do we have to push this thing or what?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430173_Lines: Gotta get you to the Master Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430088_Lines: I'll turn them into splinters for that, Groot.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430260_Lines: I've visited hundreds of moons. How come they don't all have their own personal knights?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430265_Lines: I just hope we can get this wrapped up soon. You know, I have plans.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430011_Lines: Space, I can protect. But add time to the mix, and things get tricky.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430315_Lines: We've got something in common, you and me. I am a Captain, too!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430127_Lines: I took care of that spider nest. You owe me.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430141_Lines: Haha! I knew that would work! I did…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430267_Lines: What do you mean, dad joke?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430289_Lines: I'm pretty sure this is a universe where you crashed it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430218_Lines: Bet you can find some bad guys here!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430287_Lines: I may be alive, but I'm gonna have nightmares for the rest of my life!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430003_Lines: I may be from Earth, but every planet's under my protection now.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430008_Lines: Right from one cosmic disaster to the next. Story of my life.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430343_Lines: My baby! Can you believe that my beautiful ship is just lying here on this messed-up planet? Ugh, it breaks my heart!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430271_Lines: I know right. Guess you could say we're... branching out. Haha. Ah, yeah, No, I know...please, you don't have to say anything.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430010_Lines: I've seen some weird stuff in my day. But this time hullabaloo takes the cake.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430095_Lines: Can't keep me down for long!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430187_Lines: I didn't know there was gonna be a concert. Whoo! Sweet!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430299_Lines: So...just how strong are those powers of yours? Big M. I could call you that, right？
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430079_Lines: Woo! I stomped those squirrels. And I did not feel great about it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430085_Lines: Tony! You gotta get me one of those suits!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430220_Lines: Found the next place to attack!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430310_Lines: Sayonara, suckers! 'cause they got suction cups.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430115_Lines: One priceless Egyptian artifact, broken beyond repair.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430005_Lines: Time to do the right thing. Just gotta figure out what that is…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430089_Lines: Mantis?! They won't get away with this…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430279_Lines: You gotta hook me up with one of those, bro! I could use a serious tune up.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430123_Lines: Things should calm down now ya know without that turret.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430268_Lines: Yeah, lovely planet you've got there. Regular tourist hotspot.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430294_Lines: I'm all for seizing an opportunity, Loki, but I can't imagine how much of your soul you had to sell to end up on that throne.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430181_Lines: Oh! Back off, jerks! Spider coming through!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430118_Lines: So much for your beacon, Rocket!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430286_Lines: Hey, T'Challa, did you know your sister sent me and my crew on an impossible mission, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430128_Lines: Took out the sniper. You're welcome.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430306_Lines: We've got an octopus problem here!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430013_Lines: Looks like you're my new Guardians. Huh. Guess you'll have to do…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430177_Lines: Guess we're Wakanda's official delivery service now.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430188_Lines: It's a nice place to land a ship. Just too bad mine crashed on Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430148_Lines: And the hits just keep coming!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430113_Lines: Busted up Moon Knight's ankh. Ah ha!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430009_Lines: There's only one genuine, certified Star-Lord… and you're lookin' at him!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430105_Lines: Uh oh. One of the Doc's portals.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430145_Lines: He shoots for three… and it's good!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430214_Lines: Finally! Somewhere we can cut loose!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430057_Lines: No way are we letting them win.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430074_Lines: Honestly, I've wanted to do that for ages, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430196_Lines: I'll be ready in a minute! Yeesh!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430304_Lines: Yeah, can I have my body back now? Please?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430277_Lines: And apparently just as feisty, too! Yikes!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430018_Lines: Now where is Shuri? She still owes me for that mission to Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430290_Lines: Spidey, I think maybe you need to get your web-shooters looked at, man.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430182_Lines: Once we're all clear, hit that throttle, Zero!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430285_Lines: Cool. Thanks. Just make sure it has a tape deck on it, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430056_Lines: Here we go. Who's with me?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430327_Lines: We get to go underground? Aw, that's my scene, man!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430007_Lines: Got something that needs to be blasted? You called the right guy.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430365_Lines: Long story. I don't wanna talk about it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430272_Lines: Gonna be honest, not so crazy about symbiotes now that I've visited Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430328_Lines: Let's get moving before Knull figures out our plan…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430110_Lines: All these spiders can't be good.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430282_Lines: Talk to Rocket. He did it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430186_Lines: I'm sure no one would notice if one tiny artifact went missing…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430017_Lines: This sure isn't the Earth I remember! Oh, man!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430015_Lines: This place is nastier than the Milano's kitchen. Ugh.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430139_Lines: Add that to my greatest hits!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430060_Lines: We have what it takes to win this.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430166_Lines: I did not see that coming, either did they.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430344_Lines: This thing is way harder to read than the scanners on the Milano! What species is this Knull guy anyway?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430246_Lines: So… I'm guessing you don't want to trade then?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430356_Lines: Yeah, they were my grandpa's. He thought you were the bee's knees!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430001_Lines: Someone's gotta guard the galaxy. Might as well be me.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430305_Lines: Looks like an alien… but smells like a fish…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430355_Lines: Did I ever tell you that I read all of your comics when I was a kid, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430264_Lines: This is not how I was expecting the day to play out.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430241_Lines: You know. The stars. Like, everything.

122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450274_Lines: Kings do not take orders from spies.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450311_Lines: I know a few things about going beneath the surface…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450057_Lines: A shield fit for a king.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450187_Lines: A throne fit for a king… A king like Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450273_Lines: This is what Talokan should become.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450109_Lines: Where is the honor in attacking from the shadows?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450263_Lines: You could flood this world with a mere thought. Do you truly fear what lies beneath the waves?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450143_Lines: Next time, you may not be so lucky…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450151_Lines: You were unfit for this world.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450257_Lines: Why do you insist on staying with your fool of a husband when you could rule the world at my side?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450267_Lines: You humans boast about your cutting-edge science, yet you understand less than one percent of what lies in the oceans.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450264_Lines: Mutants have always insisted how well they adapt. Perhaps they should grow some gills.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450011_Lines: You surface dwellers can't resist destroying yourselves, can you?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450279_Lines: You settle for an island when you could rule a world?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450268_Lines: The number of illegal mining and fishing ships you humans have deployed is ten times greater. I don't have the time to tell them apart before I strike them down.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450249_Lines: You are a creature of both the land and sea, just as I am.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450164_Lines: Your transgressions have been repaid in kind.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450142_Lines: You are fortunate Namor was here.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450251_Lines: The ancient arcane deities you battle... Have you ever found it peculiar how closely they resemble the creatures of the deep?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450105_Lines: I will not be stopped so easily.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450107_Lines: You cannot wash your hands of Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450271_Lines: You mean, when you humans set the surface world ablaze with your weapons of destruction. Lovely.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450079_Lines: Ha! You never had a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450141_Lines: You are in my debt now.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450333_Lines: That artificial limb of yours fascinates me…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450084_Lines: Your usefulness has long passed, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450059_Lines: Ha! Is that supposed to hurt?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450060_Lines: You will have to try harder.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450272_Lines: It will take more than light to solve our problems.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450085_Lines: You should have retired decades ago, Soldier.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450139_Lines: We shall not be your targets any longer.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450218_Lines: No swimming away now, little fish…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450320_Lines: Hurry! Knull must not claim the throne!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450281_Lines: Then your presence here may prove more useful than I expected.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450220_Lines: I have found where they've been hiding.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450290_Lines: The foul beasts died as traitors to my kingdom.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450250_Lines: This whole world could be ours, if we wish it to be, little one. Join me in my crusade.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450246_Lines: Perhaps… but not for much longer...
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450183_Lines: Perhaps this would be faster by sea…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450010_Lines: My war against the surface world will have to wait… for now…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450243_Lines: Ah, so you have decided to join me in my fight against the surface world after all? I knew you would make the right choice.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450012_Lines: Ah, I had wondered when Doom would finally bring about the end of all things…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450254_Lines: Because I would drag you down with me. Care to find out how long it takes for you to go from green to blue?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450331_Lines: A king is only as powerful as the army he commands. Mine is at the ready. Where is yours?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450008_Lines: You are in the presence of royalty. It would be wise to show some respect.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450229_Lines: Stand strong. This land is ours!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450086_Lines: Such a pity to harm a denizen of the deep…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450127_Lines: The space mammal's beacon is no more.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450114_Lines: Strange is up to his old tricks again.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450115_Lines: Strange. Always twisting reality to his whims.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450252_Lines: Should you ever encounter one you cannot defeat, perhaps I could communicate with them for you.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450124_Lines: Khonshu will plague us no more.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450334_Lines: The way it extends, it reminds me of the tentacles of the most ferocious creatures of the deep!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450101_Lines: Rest now, little one. I shall return you to the depths…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450096_Lines: Not bad… for tiny land mammals…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450184_Lines: Why must a King wait to escort a child?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450070_Lines: Now! Let us stake our claim!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450247_Lines: This chaos will only make the surface world that much easier to conquer.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450017_Lines: Ugh...Let us hope this polluted future is washed from the timeline…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450171_Lines: We will reach Yggdrasill in no time.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450118_Lines: The Punisher has taken aim at us.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450134_Lines: You will target us no longer, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450312_Lines: We shall deliver Knull his demise!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450182_Lines: Like sharks, we must keep swimming to survive.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450003_Lines: We have hidden in the depths long enough. Now is the time to strike!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450177_Lines: Wakanda has put its faith in us.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450172_Lines: The tree we seek is not far from here.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450173_Lines: Follow the web. There is no turning back now.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450129_Lines: I have shut down the talking rodent's amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450239_Lines: I have brought part of it to the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450217_Lines: It seems I have found our foe.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450244_Lines: Why would Namor wish to become a subject of a tiny island nation when all the oceans are his to command?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450286_Lines: I know these wretched creatures all too well.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450245_Lines: I've grown weary of human wars, Captain. I would rather fight my own.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450186_Lines: I swore to save Wakanda. Do not make a liar of me.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450190_Lines: I have ruled the seas. Why not a sea of stars…?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450013_Lines: I am beginning to think I should have stayed beneath the waves…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450288_Lines: I am your king, creatures! Heed my command!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450136_Lines: I have crushed those tiny menaces.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450155_Lines: They all drown in my wake.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450125_Lines: I have destroyed Moon Knight's ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450332_Lines: I see. Well, until then, step aside and let a true king lead the charge!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450189_Lines: I have encountered a real Hydra in the deep. Whatever these fools are summoning, it is not the same beast.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450188_Lines: And I thought the oceans held priceless treasures…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450197_Lines: My power swells like the waves.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450200_Lines: I am more powerful than the ocean itself!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450276_Lines: All mankind has earned my wrath. Whether on the land or in the stars!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450001_Lines: My kingdom shall rise as swiftly as the seas.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450287_Lines: Have my own subjects turned against me?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450007_Lines: Just like the pressure of the ocean, I shall crush our foes.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450269_Lines: I know every creature who dwells in the sea, but never have I seen any quite like you.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450106_Lines: My battle has only just begun.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450065_Lines: The time for battle has come.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450156_Lines: All shall fall at my hand!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450253_Lines: I assure you, brute, the feeling is mutual.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450219_Lines: Our enemies have been lurking here.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450110_Lines: They have taken aim at us from afar.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450108_Lines: Our attacker hides like a coward.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450128_Lines: Their beacon is no longer of use.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450131_Lines: Their amplifier will do no more damage.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450087_Lines: And you call yourself a Defender, Strange?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450248_Lines: Times change. But one thing never has. The only side that Namor has ever been on is his own.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450022_Lines: Namor shall bide his time… for now..
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450095_Lines: You may still be useful after all, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450176_Lines: I shall escort you to your destination, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450006_Lines: I am the ocean's avenging son. You will get no love from me.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450198_Lines: My strength grows with every passing second.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450270_Lines: Indeed. You are one-of-a-kind. But that does not mean you have to be alone.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450275_Lines: It is not Intergalactic Empire Of Wakanda I seek to destroy. Not anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450015_Lines: Ay… Pronunciation is so hard for surface dwellers.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450163_Lines: The ocean shows no mercy. Nor does its king.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450002_Lines: The tides always turn in my favor.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450199_Lines: My fury is ready to be unleashed.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450282_Lines: Knowing the terrain will give us a tactical advantage over our foes.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450018_Lines: T'Challa has built quite an empire. Let us see how strong it truly is…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450099_Lines: And Wakanda's king falls once more.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450179_Lines: I could swim there faster than this…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450094_Lines: It seems Krakoa is in good hands, Magneto.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450166_Lines: What a curious place this is…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450019_Lines: No oceans? As if this world weren't wretched enough already…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450100_Lines: All that thunder for nothing, Thor? Pathetico.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450345_Lines: Why should I care how this Knull chooses to rule his worthless planet of symbiotes?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450180_Lines: Namor does not abide failure. Nor do the gods.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450277_Lines: Namor bends the knee to no one. Not even the gods.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450178_Lines: Today, Namor stands with Wakanda. I will not fail them.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450162_Lines: You were merely a drop of water. Namor is the sea.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450174_Lines: Namor will guide you safely to the shrine.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450004_Lines: Three quarters of the Earth is mine to rule. I have come to claim the rest.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450104_Lines: Like the tide, Namor always rises again.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450335_Lines: Namor is destined to reign supreme! Soon the seas will rise and I shall claim what is mine!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450005_Lines: Those who oppose me shall be left to drown in my wake.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450291_Lines: They should have known better than to betray me.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450137_Lines: The spider nest is a threat no longer.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450135_Lines: The spiders have been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450346_Lines: If he dares to threaten my people, he will find himself facing the full fury of a true king!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450170_Lines: How many more could there be?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450195_Lines: The tide has yet to rise…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450116_Lines: This doorway… It's one of Strange's spells…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450111_Lines: This totem can mean nothing good…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450216_Lines: This site could suffer great damage…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450112_Lines: This ankh's magic is as old as the seas…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450119_Lines: This weapon cannot be left standing.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450117_Lines: Such a complex weapon for such a simple human.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450088_Lines: The strongest there is? Psh! On land perhaps…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450278_Lines: Is this really the future Mutantkind fought for? You said you would be gods!
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450016_Lines: Is this the realm of gods? Then where is Namor's throne?
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450280_Lines: The creatures on this strange world seem drawn to you.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450289_Lines: They did not obey, so they paid the price.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450014_Lines: Ah...I've met pods of dolphins more capable of saving the world…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450126_Lines: I have broken that accursed beacon.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450140_Lines: I have vanquished our hidden assailant.
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450336_Lines: That would be far easier… but not nearly as entertaining…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450165_Lines: The land has its advantages, I suppose…
122_HeroVoice_1045_ST.1045001_HeroVoice_10450292_Lines: Do none of you realize how urgent this is?

122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460258_Lines: …there are always those eager to exploit them.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460093_Lines: One tree falls, but another shall grow to take its place.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460213_Lines: Do not yield. We must protect this site!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460244_Lines: No. We will save it. Together.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460360_Lines: For the sake of the universe, I truly hope this is one of those occasions.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460257_Lines: Take it from a man who was created to be perfect: There's no such thing.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460152_Lines: You chose your path. This is where it led.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460159_Lines: There are quite a few of them, aren't there?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460251_Lines: Believe it or not, I have a dark side. Or at least I did, until I expelled it and it became its own being.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460239_Lines: That is not the only fissure I sense.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460086_Lines: They were a fool to underestimate you, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460191_Lines: I could use a healing touch…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460253_Lines: Is it not our role as men to rise above our fathers?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460248_Lines: You shall not face this alone. Together, we are a mighty forest. When our foes fall, we shall be left standing.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460050_Lines: You think you can harm me?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460243_Lines: You say that as if it is a bad thing.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460359_Lines: The rage within you… It's almost as strong as Knull's…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460252_Lines: Her light and your darkness… If only I could find such perfect balance…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460249_Lines: What a strange alliance. We should be at odds, you and I.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460267_Lines: The suffering you must have experienced here…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460154_Lines: You upset the balance of things. That could not stand.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460264_Lines: You are the spawn of Knull, are you not?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460263_Lines: You would be best to summon them all. I have a feeling we will need them.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460336_Lines: There is such good within you. Why do you hide it behind a veil of darkness?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460246_Lines: You shall soon enough… one way or another…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460307_Lines: It takes great effort to keep my cosmic energy in balance.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460285_Lines: Light must prevail over eternal darkness!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460172_Lines: Do not yield, no matter what Life and Destiny throw our way.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460081_Lines: My soul shall not be yours to claim, queen of the dead!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460235_Lines: I recently emerged from a regenerative cocoon.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460218_Lines: Do not let them steal control of this place.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460221_Lines: This vessel cannot be stopped. Push forward!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460012_Lines: There are threats ahead even greater than what the Dooms have unleashed.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460179_Lines: Even the All-Father himself could not have handled the power contained here.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460010_Lines: Even my cosmic might may not be enough to save this universe.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460206_Lines: I have located one of our opponents.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460169_Lines: Should we fail, the fates will not be kind.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460161_Lines: Onward to Yggdrasill! Our destiny awaits!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460070_Lines: Destiny was not kind to you.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460157_Lines: What a strange twist of fate…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460207_Lines: Ah. There you are. No escaping us now…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460004_Lines: In a world consumed by darkness, I will gladly be the light.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460123_Lines: The amplifier is no longer a concern.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460156_Lines: The world itself comes to my aid.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460090_Lines: Your legend will live on, Quill. I will make sure of it.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460085_Lines: Good to see you can back up all that bravado, Quill.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460365_Lines: Should the King in Black reclaim his throne, the results could be truly disastrous.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460189_Lines: I can contain my power no longer!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460008_Lines: I will leave this universe a better place than it was before I was created.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460018_Lines: My cosmic awareness has drawn me to this dark place…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460153_Lines: The universe has a great plan. You are not part of it.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460302_Lines: And this is where the fate of the universe will be decided.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460219_Lines: We can't risk losing our advantage here.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460118_Lines: The ankh's curse has been abated.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460002_Lines: Perfection is unattainable. But that should not stop us from trying to achieve it.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460212_Lines: Defend this place with all your might!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460087_Lines: I hope you could not feel their pain, Mantis.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460340_Lines: I have never been one to hide from matters of great cosmic importance, Peter Quill.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460170_Lines: We must get to the World Tree at once!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460223_Lines: We must bring their journey to a halt.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460247_Lines: What concerns you so, my floral friend?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460301_Lines: Quite the opposite. His consciousness jarred me from my slumber.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460111_Lines: The Punisher has constructed his largest weapon yet.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460126_Lines: The Punisher's turret has been dismantled.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460049_Lines: Hurting me will not be easy.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460209_Lines: If you seek our foes, here they are.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460260_Lines: It takes more than a crown and a throne to make a king.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460292_Lines: We can use Knull's own dark essence against him…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460176_Lines: Should we delay any longer, Wakanda will suffer.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460291_Lines: This is how we prevent Knull's return to power.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460166_Lines: We will guide you to safety, Zero. You have my word.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460366_Lines: It is not what he plans to do on Klyntar that should concern us. Rather, what he could do on countless worlds beyond.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460205_Lines: The damage we could do here is unparalleled…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460308_Lines: I meditate… and when that doesn't work, I watch flerken videos. So cute...
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460208_Lines: I have found the enemy stronghold.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460229_Lines: I can heal you. Come to me.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460363_Lines: I was told that you were born to hunt monsters. Why do you give pause?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460007_Lines: I tend to lost souls, like a shepherd tends to his flock.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460005_Lines: I am no golden god. I am simply a man who wishes to use his power for good.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460078_Lines: I wish I could say I'll miss you, Rocket, but I'm a terrible liar.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460232_Lines: I like Adam Warlock. But maybe I'll start calling myself Sorcerer Supreme.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460116_Lines: I have destroyed Moon Knight's totem.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460266_Lines: I was created in a lab, but it was nothing like this.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460250_Lines: I seek to save souls. You seek to collect them.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460245_Lines: I have peered into the infinite void. There is nothing to fear.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460233_Lines: You were already doing that before I arrived…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460230_Lines: I gather that was the intent.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460196_Lines: I am not at my best.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460013_Lines: It is my destiny to lead you to victory. Do not stand in my way.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460328_Lines: My friends have been through many trials, it seems. But fate has brought them exactly where they need to be.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460240_Lines: My soul is not as pure as most may believe.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460003_Lines: I was born to change humanity for the better. That time has come.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460001_Lines: I will bring peace to this universe, no matter the cost.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460303_Lines: I was adrift in my cocoon when cosmic forces summoned me to this world.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460178_Lines: I can feel the cosmic energy coursing through these halls…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460144_Lines: I have dealt with three of them.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460259_Lines: I have been from one side of this universe to the next. Never have I seen an empire so grand.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460330_Lines: The other symbiotes I have encountered are not nearly this domestic… nor are their tastes quite so refined…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460234_Lines: Perhaps a good fight will improve your self-image.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460011_Lines: Perhaps I should have stayed in my cocoon a bit longer…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460236_Lines: Perhaps I should focus my cosmic power on more important matters...
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460268_Lines: My friend has risen once more.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460151_Lines: Our foes have fallen by my hand.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460101_Lines: They are shooting at us from afar.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460271_Lines: A new threat rises from beneath the waves…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460174_Lines: Not much further now, Zero. You can do this.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460222_Lines: Do not let their vehicle pass at any cost.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460117_Lines: Whatever Moon Knight summoned has been banished.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460195_Lines: No need to worry about me.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460162_Lines: If we must play the role of gods this day, so be it.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460062_Lines: Time is not on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460077_Lines: Your legend has come to an end, Star-Lord.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460092_Lines: You were a beacon of hope, Mantis. Your light will live on inside us all.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460079_Lines: I feel your pain, Mantis. But this was my only choice.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460082_Lines: May your tortured soul finally find some peace, Moon Knight.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460136_Lines: You are safe now, my friend.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460337_Lines: I can sense the struggle inside of you, my friend. The beast raging within…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460228_Lines: Come to me for healing, friend.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460127_Lines: That turret is not a threat anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460110_Lines: Is that turret truly necessary, Castle?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460276_Lines: Our aquatic enemies have been eliminated.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460088_Lines: It is your foes who fall like timber, Groot.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460080_Lines: Perhaps your splinters will grow into something better, Groot.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460338_Lines: We all have dark sides. Even I. Just ask the Magus…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460083_Lines: I couldn't allow a trace of Knull's darkness to survive, Venom.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460121_Lines: Let's see how they fare without their beacon…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460335_Lines: You are a curious one, Loki Laufeyson.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460274_Lines: The spawn of Monstro are no more.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460119_Lines: Rocket's beacon is out of service.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460091_Lines: You fought until the end, Rocket. You should be proud.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460133_Lines: The shooter has been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460167_Lines: Wakanda has called us to action. We shall answer.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460175_Lines: If we fail Wakanda, we fail the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460165_Lines: You will not face this trail alone, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460171_Lines: The center of the web is near. We cannot stop now.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460270_Lines: The soul cannot truly be extinguished.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460113_Lines: A spider nest? This does not bode well…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460364_Lines: A single symbiote is one thing. But a whole planet is another matter entirely.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460304_Lines: Then the fates brought us together. We would be wise to answer their call.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460273_Lines: It seems the king of the seas has loyal followers...
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460155_Lines: Fate is on my side, it seems.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460009_Lines: A shame that these beings have not yet evolved beyond such petty squabbles…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460327_Lines: Amazing how a world can create so much beauty, yet can hide such danger beneath its mimicry.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460211_Lines: The true battle takes place here!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460108_Lines: A portal through space has been opened.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460329_Lines: Knull's followers are the embodiment of evil. But we shall restore the light to this forsaken world, no matter the cost!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460272_Lines: Namor has called forth warriors from the deep.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460275_Lines: Namor's beasts have been returned to the sea.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460284_Lines: No! Knull's tainted touch cannot spread beyond this world!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460185_Lines: Patience. I will be ready soon enough…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460129_Lines: The spiders' nest has been cleared.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460128_Lines: No more spiders to worry about.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460163_Lines: The web beckons…and we shall not be deterred.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460164_Lines: Our success is woven into the web itself.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460015_Lines: Let us see if those who dwell here are truly worthy of worship…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460210_Lines: Come to this spot and attack!
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460100_Lines: There is still so much to do…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460104_Lines: An object of great mystic power…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460120_Lines: That should take care of their beacon.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460177_Lines: This nexus point could be the key to solving our crisis.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460202_Lines: This place is curious. Keep an eye here…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460017_Lines: This empire is the true pinnacle of human achievement.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460048_Lines: This shield will serve me well.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460105_Lines: This artifact is quite powerful… Beware…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460216_Lines: This place is important. We must take control.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460106_Lines: I suppose this ankh belongs to Moon Knight…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460016_Lines: All realities converge here. We must tread carefully.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460109_Lines: One of Strange's portals. Watch your backs.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460314_Lines: It could guide us to victory. Be careful not let this conflict snuff it out.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460014_Lines: The fear and pain that resonate here… It's almost too much to bear…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460262_Lines: This Web of Life and Destiny… Are you its protector?
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460065_Lines: I have found more lost souls…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460130_Lines: Those spiders will not bother us again.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460132_Lines: That sniper will think twice before targeting us again.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460265_Lines: Ah… Then let me join you in your crusade.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460112_Lines: That turret is capable of unfathomable destruction.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460006_Lines: Where there is evil in this universe, I will be there to balance it.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460241_Lines: You are wise beyond your many years, Captain…
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460313_Lines: You have a light that radiates from within you, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460173_Lines: We have no choice but to reach the portal.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460339_Lines: This conflict is growing more dire with every new challenge that we face.
122_HeroVoice_1046_ST.1046001_HeroVoice_10460242_Lines: I have learned all I need to know, Peter Quill. You need not regale me with your tales of personal glory.

122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480265_Lines: A half-Oni sits upon the throne? What a strange kingdom…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480079_Lines: Perhaps you are the leader you claim to be, Magneto.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480337_Lines: Whether god or otherwise, respect is something to be earned. Not demanded.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480233_Lines: No. The villagers loved him, for he protected them from evil overlords.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480168_Lines: The Tree lies ahead. We can't turn back now!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480234_Lines: Perhaps they could even cut you.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480014_Lines: Too often, men prove themselves worse than demons.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480161_Lines: Today, we answer the gods' prayers.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480271_Lines: What is it that they make in this wretched place?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480158_Lines: A few too many of them for my liking.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480243_Lines: Is it true that they call you Logan?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480020_Lines: They call me Psylocke. That name shall do.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480127_Lines: That gun was no match for my sword.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480279_Lines: If only I could find the road that takes me home…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480237_Lines: You need not fear me, little Yokai.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480277_Lines: Have you come to slay the Great Snake in its den as well, little Yokai?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480068_Lines: You're not nearly as fierce as my Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480254_Lines: How do you ensure they remain loyal to your cause?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480283_Lines: What monsters have you slain? Oni? Yokai? Demons?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480219_Lines: As cold-hearted as your name suggests, Frost.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480248_Lines: That would make you the only one.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480229_Lines: So I have learned. This world is full of dangers I could never have imagined.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480241_Lines: You look at me as if you know me.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480282_Lines: I feel something familiar about you. As though we have walked the same path.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480336_Lines: You are not as human as you look, are you?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480253_Lines: You lead a legion of Yokai?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480069_Lines: An iron suit cannot withstand a psychic blade.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480011_Lines: One blade pierces minds. The other, hearts.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480326_Lines: Onward, to the nest of Orochi.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480268_Lines: Even so, it appears Japan cannot escape its fate.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480005_Lines: Enemies can become friends, but only if we show our foes respect.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480334_Lines: I am told that a demon hides inside of you.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480319_Lines: The Great Snake shall taste his own poison.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480221_Lines: What year is it anywhere? All that matters is now.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480272_Lines: Ah. My area of expertise. Lead me to them so that they may taste my blade!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480006_Lines: Hmm. It appears some timelines feature a very different version of me…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480247_Lines: Where I come from, you are known as Orochi, the Great Snake.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480238_Lines: It's what we called ancient spirits where I come from. You are of both the water and the earth. That is rare indeed.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480273_Lines: Where I come from, Tokyo is not a kingdom of spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480204_Lines: If we strike, we strike here!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480003_Lines: I will not rest until I return to my world once more.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480126_Lines: The amplifier will pose no further threat.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480117_Lines: The oceans have spawned new foes!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480008_Lines: My Odachi is sharp. My mind is sharper.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480106_Lines: Open doors lead to unwelcome guests, Doctor.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480335_Lines: If you do, I cannot guarantee his safety. Or yours.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480015_Lines: I have battled enough demons. Bring on the gods!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480007_Lines: Demons. Yokai and Villains. They all fall by my blade just the same.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480278_Lines: Perfect. You focus on the minions while I eliminate their king.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480177_Lines: There is nothing more sacred than a temple.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480071_Lines: Should I bury you on land or at sea, little Yokai?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480230_Lines: We escaped the Collector together, little one. We shall face this new threat side-by-side as well.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480121_Lines: The little panda's beacon is no more.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480082_Lines: Your weapons are inelegant, Frank, but effective.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480222_Lines: No. I have never known you either.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480227_Lines: Hard to know. Our kind of work doesn't get into the history books.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480172_Lines: We are almost there, Zero. Don't stop now!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480327_Lines: Come! Salvation lies beneath the surface!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480067_Lines: Spew your venom no more, demon!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480171_Lines: If we hope to reach Budokan, we need to move!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480242_Lines: I have been seeking others like me...
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480348_Lines: I have fought Orochi before. But it was nothing like this…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480197_Lines: We could cause great destruction here.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480246_Lines: We fought side-by-side in another lifetime, Hulkmaru. I have seen you smash your foes.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480169_Lines: We must get to Yggdrasill soon.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480349_Lines: We must slay the Great Snake in its nest... before its children can devour us...
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480009_Lines: We have demons to slay. What are we waiting for?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480160_Lines: I will clear path to the sacred tree.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480163_Lines: I will get you where you need to go, Spider-Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480244_Lines: My pet wolf was named Logan. I miss him…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480001_Lines: I'm just a sword for hire. This is all so much bigger than me.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480094_Lines: I'm back. Mind, body, and soul.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480252_Lines: I wish you were wrong. But I know in my heart that you're right.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480119_Lines: I have destroyed that troublesome ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480017_Lines: I am a long way from the forests of Kirisaki Mountain…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480270_Lines: I look forward to cutting off all eight of his heads and tails.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480305_Lines: I must regain my full power first.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480097_Lines: I don't give up so easily.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480138_Lines: I've taught that shooter a lesson.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480122_Lines: I've broken the tiny rodent's beacon.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480124_Lines: I've broken the talking tanuki's amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480232_Lines: I knew of a green monster once.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480267_Lines: I once ended the reign of a notorious Daimyo here, but now an evil corporation has risen in their place.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480002_Lines: I've fought Oni. Slayed demons. This should be easy.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480251_Lines: I was… once. But now that life seems so long ago.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480178_Lines: I've fought more frightening creatures bare handed.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480189_Lines: I fear I am not at my best.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480223_Lines: My reason is to strike down Doom…and then return home.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480263_Lines: The blade of my Odachi is forged of pure psychic energy.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480245_Lines: I remember you. From Kirisaki Mountain. You are an Oni.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480128_Lines: I prefer a more elegant weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480207_Lines: I am in need of help.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480090_Lines: A shame this was your last dance, Lord of Stars.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480266_Lines: So, you are not part ogre then?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480120_Lines: Keep your curses to yourself, Moon Knight.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480010_Lines: If we save all timelines, perhaps I can finally return to my own.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480235_Lines: The Collector took me from my world, with no way to return.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480157_Lines: They are many. But we will prevail.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480018_Lines: I have never slayed a planet before. This should be fun.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480012_Lines: We are warriors, no matter what worlds we come from. Do not lose sight of that.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480080_Lines: Clearly, your Goddess smiles upon you, Storm.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480072_Lines: You betrayed my trust, Mantis. There is a price for that.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480165_Lines: Not even a great Oni could stop us, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480118_Lines: The moon totem has been destroyed.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480220_Lines: Lin Lie, you are a true warrior.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480086_Lines: Your feast has come to an end, Venom.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480129_Lines: I'll take a blade over bullets any day.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480133_Lines: The water Yokai have been slain.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480073_Lines: I will be doing the smashing here, Hulkmaru.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480135_Lines: The sea king's pet Yokai are vanquished.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480137_Lines: The sniper has been taken care of.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480054_Lines: We need to finish this. Now!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480214_Lines: We can't afford to slow down now.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480166_Lines: The fate of Wakanda lies in our hands.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480076_Lines: The Great Snake still hungers, it seems.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480228_Lines: How strange. I cannot seem to read your thoughts…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480164_Lines: I am curious to see this Budokan.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480134_Lines: Back to the ocean's depths, demons!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480318_Lines: Knull shall be undone by his own essence? How poetic.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480083_Lines: Our spirits shall meet again some day, little one.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480212_Lines: We cannot let them take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480307_Lines: Patience. I will be able to strike soon.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480170_Lines: Patience, Spider-Zero. We'll clear this path for you.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480084_Lines: At least you are truly free now, Mantis.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480091_Lines: You fought well, Man of Spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480131_Lines: The spider nest has been cleared.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480236_Lines: And if it doesn't, I will cleave these Dooms in two for what they've done.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480231_Lines: If only all Yokai were so agreeable…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480051_Lines: Let's show them who we are.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480013_Lines: Clear a path. Unless you wish me to clear your mind… permanently.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480016_Lines: This… is not the Japan I remember…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480155_Lines: This world isn't so bad after all.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480275_Lines: This Hydra. It is a monster of legend, is it not?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480198_Lines: This place could be easily damaged.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480105_Lines: This item seems ancient… and powerful…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480070_Lines: It didn't have to come to this, great forest Oni…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480052_Lines: There is a prize to be claimed.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480141_Lines: This is not a battle we can face alone.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480046_Lines: This battle is ours to win.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480274_Lines: I fear we will have to disagree on that.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480269_Lines: This must be the nest of the Great Snake.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480004_Lines: Everything in this place feels so familiar, and yet so strange.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480176_Lines: The Oni here are even more hideous than the ones on my world.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480101_Lines: A long distance attack? Watch out!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480125_Lines: The rodent's amplifier has been shut down.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480276_Lines: Then we shall slay them all, man and beast alike!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480264_Lines: Your fancy metal may be strong, but I assure you, my will is stronger.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480077_Lines: Your demons chose their queen wisely, Magik.

122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490183_Lines: And I thought one Spider was too loud!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490081_Lines: Try Adamantium bullets next time, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490226_Lines: I'll admit, ya made that look good, Emma.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490016_Lines: Don't need enhanced senses to smell that somethin' is off here…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490272_Lines: This is your Weapon X, eh? Well, now's your chance to get some payback.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490273_Lines: My claws can cut through almost anything, darlin'. Wanna put some money on it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490162_Lines: More of them than of us.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490092_Lines: Save me a spot in Hell, would ya, Illyana?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490075_Lines: No wonder your brother called ya snowflake, Illyana.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490270_Lines: Don't even think about it, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490340_Lines: Can't break an Adamantium skeleton, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490264_Lines: Seems the same to me, deep down. We're still on the prowl, ain't we?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490127_Lines: Hope you didn't need that beacon, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490102_Lines: You can put me down, but I always get back up.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490347_Lines: What the hell are you lookin' at, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490158_Lines: You had to know that was comin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490252_Lines: So… you're tellin' me there's a whole multiverse full of Spider-Folk?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490087_Lines: Ninja moves better than mine? I'm impressed, Sai.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490114_Lines: That's a mighty big gun, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490244_Lines: I don't like that look, Erik. What's goin' on under that helmet of yours?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490341_Lines: You can shoot fast, bub, but I can heal even faster.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490006_Lines: Got a problem, bub? Talk to the claws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490168_Lines: Time to get it in gear, kid.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490179_Lines: Kick up the pace. Wakanda needs us.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490121_Lines: Eight legs versus six claws? I'll take those odds.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490328_Lines: The King in Black is about to rise if we don't get movin'!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490219_Lines: If we don't move it, we're gonna lose it!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490043_Lines: No damage I can't take now!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490169_Lines: Ready to move those webs, darlin'?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490027_Lines: I'm ready, bub. Put me in.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490178_Lines: Ain't stoppin' 'til you get to that fancy Web.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490170_Lines: Don't worry, Zero. We ain't gonna let you down.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490266_Lines: Ninjas. Samurai. Met a nice girl there once…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490173_Lines: C'mon! Let's move that blasted hammer!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490133_Lines: Your turret's gonna need repairs, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490233_Lines: Big talk. Think you can back it up?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490259_Lines: We've both seen tomorrow, bub. Wouldn't exactly call it bright.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490083_Lines: Yikes. Remind me to keep my distance, Erik…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490236_Lines: Folks like these, they might have powers, but they ain't like you and me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490240_Lines: Well, well. Fancy seein' you here, jade jaws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490003_Lines: You picked the wrong day to drag me into this mess, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490161_Lines: Huh. The world really was against ya!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490129_Lines: Fried your amp, trash panda. Deal with it.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490163_Lines: Geez! How many of 'em are there?!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490089_Lines: Always a pleasure watchin' you work, Nat.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490176_Lines: We'll have this clear for ya in a minute, darlin'.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490350_Lines: Ain't the size of the Mutant that matters. It's how sharp his claws are…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490265_Lines: I remember the Japan from before your grandpa was born, darlin'...
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490116_Lines: Watch out. Castle upgraded his weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490097_Lines: You put up a good fight, Bucky. Rest easy now.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490146_Lines: This don't mean we're a team, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490088_Lines: Glad it wasn't me you were smashin' this time, Bruce.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490202_Lines: Gotta keep an eye on this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490327_Lines: Let's get this thing underground. Knull's waitin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490241_Lines: What's wrong? Scared your rage ain't what it used to be?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490115_Lines: The Punisher set up some kinda turret.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490067_Lines: Can't sneak up on us, bub!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490235_Lines: Why would I do that, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490225_Lines: Never really trusted ya in the first place, Frost…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490218_Lines: We don't budge from this spot, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490215_Lines: We gotta focus on this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490258_Lines: Shouldn't we both be retired by now, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490052_Lines: Up to us to take 'em down.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490180_Lines: We ain't gonna fail Wakanda. Ya got my word.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490228_Lines: Been there? I'm the diplomatic envoy.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490268_Lines: I didn't do it for you, lady. Just gave 'em what they deserved.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490012_Lines: I came all the way from Krakoa for this?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490017_Lines: Don't matter how old I am. I can still take out any of you chumps.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490156_Lines: Didn't think I'd let ya get away, did ya?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490033_Lines: Why the hell ain't I healin'?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490255_Lines: Sorry to hear it, darlin'. But I ain't no one's pet. Not in any reality.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490002_Lines: I've carried this rage since I was born…centuries ago…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490231_Lines: I remember when they patented chewing gum…ugh I'm getting too old for this.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490070_Lines: I'd stay down if I were you.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490013_Lines: This fight's gonna be over before it even gets started.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490015_Lines: So, this is the end of all that is, eh? Not on my watch, darlin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490203_Lines: Let's rip this place to pieces!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490132_Lines: Sorry, Frank. Big guns don't mean big wins.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490212_Lines: Defend this place with your lives.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490342_Lines: Maybe later. Right now, it looks like we're on the same side.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490091_Lines: Don't worry, Mags. We won't let the dream die.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490245_Lines: Ease up, bub. Mutants finally have a chance thanks to what we're doin' on Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490175_Lines: A whole Multiverse is countin' on us to finish this run!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490112_Lines: What're you up to now, Strange?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490005_Lines: I make this look good in any timeline.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490019_Lines: Hydra, Weapon X. It's all the same. And it ends now.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490010_Lines: Past, present, future. Don't matter. We gotta save 'em all.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490300_Lines: Told ya I was the best.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490349_Lines: Yeah. I'd hate to have to lay you out again in front of all our friends.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490090_Lines: See you on the other side, Stormy.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490095_Lines: So much for bein' the strongest, Hulky.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490234_Lines: Mostly just take the kids on field trips these days. Mountains, rooftops, the moon. My students get a 30-second head start before I go HUNTIN'. Last one standin' gets an A. Extra credit if they manage to hurt me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490181_Lines: Just like Weapon X… Maybe worse…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490018_Lines: Point me towards Dooms. I owe him some extra scars.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490021_Lines: Let's see how the Web of Life and Destiny holds up against a little Adamantium.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490230_Lines: Can't focus with the all the mess back home on my mind, 'Ro.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490206_Lines: Just who I was lookin' for.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490036_Lines: Even better than my Mutant power!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490104_Lines: I've healed from a hundred times worse.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490023_Lines: Livin' islands I can handle. But this place is out of control.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490128_Lines: The raccoon's beacon is done for.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490078_Lines: Always bet on the little guy, Hulk.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490142_Lines: Sniper's down. We're in the clear.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490263_Lines: This sure is a long way from the Intergalactic Empire Of Wakanda…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490171_Lines: Logan, reportin' for royal messenger duty.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490014_Lines: Somethin' tells me this is good day to have a healin' factor…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490348_Lines: Take my word, Goldie: You don't wanna see that side of me. It ain't pretty.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490184_Lines: Reckon it's time for a regime change…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490120_Lines: Looks like Namor ordered our next course.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490247_Lines: Can't figure out which is heavier… that sword or your crown…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490160_Lines: Not the way I expected that to go down…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490096_Lines: Never thought I'd miss hearin' you yap, Spidey…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490253_Lines: You gotta be kiddin' me. I can barely tolerate one of 'em!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490339_Lines: Too bad. Was hopin' you'd be on the other side…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490100_Lines: Like a bad penny. I just keep comin' back.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490140_Lines: Those creeps earned a burial at sea.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490319_Lines: Knull's about to get a taste of his own medicine.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490139_Lines: Got any other fish for me to fillet, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490122_Lines: Don't send squids to do your dirty work, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490320_Lines: Time to make sure this king never takes the throne!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490026_Lines: Your boy Logan is ready for action.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490074_Lines: This Mutant carves his own path, old man!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490227_Lines: Never liked ya, Emma. But we sure coulda used ya…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490119_Lines: Spiders! We've got some exterminatin' to do!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490177_Lines: Hang tight, Zero. We'll clear the way.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490099_Lines: A health boost? Fine by me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490174_Lines: Could really use a Rainbow Bridge about now…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490243_Lines: All this cosmic crap just don't compare to a good ol' Madripoor street fight.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490182_Lines: Anyone lookin' to make a name for themselves?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490008_Lines: Anyone stands in my way, they won't be standin' much longer.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490084_Lines: And I thought I was ruthless, Magik…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490157_Lines: Had a claw here with your name on it…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490007_Lines: This ain't my first rodeo. Sure as hell won't be my last.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490246_Lines: That's a mighty grim look for such a pretty little face, darlin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490232_Lines: No need to get your fancy claws dirty, your highness. I got this.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490216_Lines: This place is ours for the takin'.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490217_Lines: No chance we let 'em take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490020_Lines: This World Tree is in need of some serious trimmin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490009_Lines: I can finish this without even poppin' my claws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490276_Lines: Perfect for doin' some huntin'. You with me, T'Challa?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490004_Lines: Been doin' this a long time. Ain't about to stop now.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490001_Lines: I'm the best there is at what I do, but what I do isn't very nice.
